fmt: 4. After successfully challenging the Cross-server Gym Leader, players will have to wait some time before challenging again. However, challenge attempts are unlimited.
fmt_tw: 4.跨服館主挑戰同樣有一定的冷卻時間，成功挑戰後需要休息一段時間後才能重新挑戰；但沒有挑戰次數的限制
fmt_en: 4. After successfully challenging the Cross-server Gym Leader, players will have to wait some time before challenging again. However, challenge attempts are unlimited.
fmt_kr: 4. 글로벌 관장 도전 시 일정의 쿨타임 제한이 있으며, 도전 성공 후 일정 휴식 시간이 지나야만 재도전할 수 있으나 도전 횟수의 제한을 받지 않습니다.

fmt: 5. Cross-server Gym Leader Challenge requires Pokémon with designated types (either first type or second type will do). Challenge is not available without qualified Pokémon.
fmt_tw: 5.跨服館主挑戰需要擁有指定屬性的精靈（第一、第二屬性只要有任一滿足即可），如果沒有對應限定屬性的精靈，則無法進行挑戰
fmt_en: 5. Cross-server Gym Leader Challenge requires Pokémon with designated types (either first type or second type will do). Challenge is not available without qualified Pokémon.
fmt_kr: 5. 글로벌 관장 도전 시 지정된 속성의 포켓몬이 필요하며(첫 번째, 두 번째 속성에서 아무 조건이라도 만족 시 가능), 만약 상응하는 속성 조건의 포켓몬이 없다면 도전을 진행할 수 없습니다

fmt: #C0xF76B45#【Cross-server Gym Reward Preview】
fmt_tw: #C0xF76B45#【跨服道館獎勵預覽】
fmt_en: #C0xF76B45#【Cross-server Gym Reward Preview】
fmt_kr: #C0xF76B45#[글로벌 체육관 보상 미리 보기]

fmt: 1. During the event, players can get items from Card Flips.
fmt_tw: 1.活動時間內，可以進行翻牌玩法獲得翻出的道具
fmt_en: 1. During the event, players can get items from Card Flips.
fmt_kr: 1. 이벤트 기간에 카드 뒤집기로 아이템을 얻을 수 있습니다

fmt: 2. There are few rounds of Card Flips. Each round grants a Top Prize. Flip over the card with Top Prize to receive the reward right away and start the next round of Card Flips.
fmt_tw: 2.活動設置多輪翻牌，每輪翻牌有一個超級頭獎，頭獎可能在任何一張牌面之下，翻到之後可以立即獲得獎勵並且進行下一輪的翻牌遊戲
fmt_en: 2. There are few rounds of Card Flips. Each round grants a Top Prize. Flip over the card with Top Prize to receive the reward right away and start the next round of Card Flips.
fmt_kr: 2. 이벤트에서는 여러 라운드가 있으며, 라운드마다 대상이 있습니다. 대상은 아무 카드 아래에 있으며, 찾아내면 즉시 보상을 얻고 다음 라운드로 넘어갑니다

fmt: 3. Card Flips consumes free chances (reset at 5am every day) first then the quest chances (do not reset and can be obtained by completing quests).
fmt_tw: 3.翻牌會消耗次數，優先消耗免費次數，免費次數每日5點重置；再消耗任務次數，任務次數不重置，可通過完成任務獲得
fmt_en: 3. Card Flips consumes free chances (reset at 5am every day) first then the quest chances (do not reset and can be obtained by completing quests).
fmt_kr: 3. 카드를 뒤집으면 횟수가 차감되며, 무료 횟수가 우선적으로 차감되고 횟수는 매일 5시에 초기화됩니다. 그리고 퀘스트 횟수가 차감되며, 퀘스트 횟수는 초기화되지 않고, 퀘스트 클리어를 통해 획득할 수 있습니다

fmt: 4. Top Prize of each round will be displayed in the event page. Good luck!
fmt_tw: 4.翻牌的每輪超級頭獎內容會在活動頁面依次顯示，祝你好運！
fmt_en: 4. Top Prize of each round will be displayed in the event page. Good luck!
fmt_kr: 4. 카드 뒤집기의 라운드 대상 내용은 이벤트 화면에서 순서대로 표시됩니다. 행운을 빕니다!

fmt: 1. The host can kick out other players from the room, and other players can also kick out the host by voting.
fmt_tw: 1.在滿足條件的情況下，房主可將其他玩家請出房間，其他玩家也可通過投票的方式將房主請出房間，點擊對方的出戰精靈頭像可以找到這個功能
fmt_en: 1. The host can kick out other players from the room, and other players can also kick out the host by voting.
fmt_kr: 1. 조건을 충족한 상황에서 방장은 다른 유저를 내보낼 수 있으며, 다른 유저들도 투표를 통해 방장을 내보낼 수 있습니다

fmt: 2. Kickout has 3 requirements: 1) There are at least 3 players who have completed the challenge in the room; 2) The player who was kicked out has been in the room for at least 3 hours; 3) He/she has no challenge attempt or hasn't challenged yet.
fmt_tw: 2.以上需要滿足3個條件：一，房間內至少有3個玩家完成挑戰；二，被請出房間的玩家在房間內至少呆滿3小時；三，Ta成功挑戰次數為0或未挑戰
fmt_en: 2. Kickout has 3 requirements: 1) There are at least 3 players who have completed the challenge in the room; 2) The player who was kicked out has been in the room for at least 3 hours; 3) He/she has no challenge attempt or hasn't challenged yet.
fmt_kr: 2. 3개의 조건이 충족해야 합니다: (1). 방 안에 최소 3명의 유저가 도전을 완료해야 합니다. (2). 최소 3시간 동안 방에 머무른 유저만 강퇴할 수 있습니다. (3). 그가 도전에 성공한 횟수가 0이거나 도전을 진행하지 않아야 합니다

fmt: 3. The host must complete challenge at least once before kicking out a player.
fmt_tw: 3.房主請玩家出房間時，自身需要滿足完成至少1次挑戰
fmt_en: 3. The host must complete challenge at least once before kicking out a player.
fmt_kr: 3. 방장이 유저를 방에서 내보낼 때 자신은 최소 1회의 도전을 만족해야 합니다

fmt: 4. Only players who have completed challenge 3 times are qualified to vote. The voting result is decided by majority.
fmt_tw: 4.其他玩家投票請房主出房間時，自身需要完成3次挑戰後有投票資格，並且投票結果滿足請Ta走票數多於讓Ta留下的票數才可請房主出房間
fmt_en: 4. Only players who have completed challenge 3 times are qualified to vote. The voting result is decided by majority.
fmt_kr: 4. 다른 유저가 방장을 강퇴하려 할 때 자신은 최소 3번의 도전을 완료해야 자격이 주어집니다. 그리고 투표 결과가 찬성이 반대보다 많아야만 방장을 강퇴할 수 있습니다

fmt: 5. The player who was kicked out 3 times before challenge reset cannot join the Elemental Challenge before new challenge starts.
fmt_tw: 5.挑戰重置前累計被請出房間達3次的玩家不可再次參與本次元素挑戰，下次挑戰開始時可正常進入
fmt_en: 5. The player who was kicked out 3 times before challenge reset cannot join the Elemental Challenge before new challenge starts.
fmt_kr: 5. 도전 초기화 전에 강퇴 횟수가 3회 이상인 유저는 이번 엘리멘탈 챌린지에 다시 참여할 수 없으며, 다음 도전이 시작할 때 정상적으로 플레이 할 수 있습니다

fmt: 1. During the event, shards with the same quality can be converted. The original shard will be replaced by selected shard after conversion.
fmt_tw: 1.活動時間內，同品質碎片之間可進行轉換；成功轉換後背包內的碎片會被消耗掉、並獲得所選擇的碎片。
fmt_en: 1. During the event, shards with the same quality can be converted. The original shard will be replaced by selected shard after conversion.
fmt_kr: 1. 이벤트 기간에 같은 등급의 조각끼리 서로 전환할 수 있습니다. 전환 성공 후 인벤토리 안의 조각은 소모되며, 선택한 조각을 획득합니다.

fmt: 2. Different shard has different convertible amount and limit.
fmt_tw: 2.每期活動，不同品質碎片可轉換的數量獨立計算，且都有一定的轉換次數上限
fmt_en: 2. Different shard has different convertible amount and limit.
fmt_kr: 2. 이벤트마다 다른 등급의 조각의 전환 개수는 독립적으로 계산되며, 일정의 전환 상한이 있습니다

fmt: 3. The higher the VIP level, the more chances to convert.
fmt_tw: 3.玩家vip等級提升到一定階段後，可提升額外的轉換次數
fmt_en: 3. The higher the VIP level, the more chances to convert.
fmt_kr: 3. 유저의 vip 레벨이 일정 단계에 도달하면 추가 전환 횟수를 올릴 수 있습니다

fmt: 4. The convertible shards vary each event. Please stay tuned!
fmt_tw: 4.每期活動可轉換的碎片會有所區別；如果本期沒有你想要轉換的碎片，敬請期待下次活動！
fmt_en: 4. The convertible shards vary each event. Please stay tuned!
fmt_kr: 4. 이벤트마다 전환 가능한 조각은 서로 다릅니다. 만약 이번 회차에 전환을 원하는 조각이 없다면 다음 회 이벤트를 기다려 주세요!

fmt: 1. Each festival Boss can only be challenged once.
fmt_tw: 1.對於單個節日BOSS而言，每人只能挑戰一次
fmt_en: 1. Each festival Boss can only be challenged once.
fmt_kr: 1. 단일 명절 보스는 유저마다 1회만 도전할 수 있습니다

fmt: 2. Players cannot challenge the festival dungeon without any attempt left.
fmt_tw: 2.每個節日副本都有挑戰次數上限，達到挑戰次數上限後不可再挑戰
fmt_en: 2. Players cannot challenge the festival dungeon without any attempt left.
fmt_kr: 2. 명절 던전마다 도전 횟수 상한이 있으며, 도전 횟수 상한에 달하면 더이상 도전할 수 없습니다

fmt: 3. Players can challenge self-found festival Boss once. It is not counted in challenge attempts.
fmt_tw: 3.自己可以挑戰自己發現的節日BOSS一次，這次挑戰次數不累計到他人挑戰次數中
fmt_en: 3. Players can challenge self-found festival Boss once. It is not counted in challenge attempts.
fmt_kr: 3. 자신은 자신이 발견한 명절 보스에 1회 도전할 수 있으며, 해당 도전은 타인의 도전 횟수에 누적되지 않습니다

fmt: 4. Festival Dungeon has three difficulties. Rank-SSS is the hardest one.
fmt_tw: 4.節日副本具有三個難度分級，最高難度為SSS級
fmt_en: 4. Festival Dungeon has three difficulties. Rank-SSS is the hardest one.
fmt_kr: 4. 명절 던전에는 3개의 난이도가 있으며, 최고 난이도는 SSS 급입니다

fmt: 5. Each dungeon has a separate countdown, when the countdown is over, the challenge info disappears immediately.
fmt_tw: 5.每個節日BOSS副本有單獨的倒計時，倒計時結束時挑戰資訊即刻消失
fmt_en: 5. Each dungeon has a separate countdown, when the countdown is over, the challenge info disappears immediately.
fmt_kr: 5. 명절 보스 던전마다 독립된 시간제한이 있으며, 시간이 지나면 도전 정보가 바로 사라집니다

fmt: 6. Rewards are awarded for successful challenges. No rewards and no consumption for failed challenges.
fmt_tw: 6.挑戰勝利後給予玩家一定的獎勵，挑戰失敗後無獎勵且不消耗挑戰次數
fmt_en: 6. Rewards are awarded for successful challenges. No rewards and no consumption for failed challenges.
fmt_kr: 6. 도전 승리 시 유저에게 일정의 보상이 주어지며, 도전 실패 시 보상은 없지만 도전 횟수도 차감되지 않습니다

fmt: 7. Each player can activate a limited amount of Halloween Boss with cooldown.
fmt_tw: 7.每人每天觸發的萬聖節BOSS有個數上限和啟動冷卻
fmt_en: 7. Each player can activate a limited amount of Halloween Boss with cooldown.
fmt_kr: 7. 유저마다 매일 발동시키는 할로윈 보스는 개수 상한 및 활성화 쿨타임이 적용됩니다

fmt: 1. Red Pack Rain starts regularly every day. The player who participates in it will be awarded a Coupon, with the probability of winning a super prize.
fmt_tw: 1.每日定時開啟天降紅包小遊戲專場，參與小遊戲的玩家將獲得一張兌獎券，有概率獲得超級大獎
fmt_en: 1. Red Pack Rain starts regularly every day. The player who participates in it will be awarded a Coupon, with the probability of winning a super prize.
fmt_kr: 1. 매일 일정 시각에 보너스 미니 게임이 열리며, 미니 게임에 참여한 유저는 교환권 1장을 얻어 특급 대상을 얻을 확률이 주어집니다.

fmt: 2. The event is launched at fixed time frame. Please check info on the event page. Do not miss your red packs and coupons!
fmt_tw: 2.天降紅包小遊戲專場每天在固定時間開啟，請留意活動主介面的顯示內容哦，逾時即關閉，也不會獲得本場的兌獎券
fmt_en: 2. The event is launched at fixed time frame. Please check info on the event page. Do not miss your red packs and coupons!
fmt_kr: 2. 보너스 미니 게임은 매일 일정 시간에 오픈되니 이벤트 메인 화면을 잘 주시해 주세요. 시간이 지나면 바로 닫히고 교환권을 얻지 못합니다

fmt: 3. Players should tap the dropping red packs within the required time to obtain them. Red packs can be opened in the bag for rewards.
fmt_tw: 3.天降紅包小遊戲需要玩家在規定時間內點擊螢幕上落下的紅包道具，時間截止後，點擊了多少將獲得多少紅包，紅包道具可前往背包打開獲得獎勵
fmt_en: 3. Players should tap the dropping red packs within the required time to obtain them. Red packs can be opened in the bag for rewards.
fmt_kr: 3. 보너스 미니 게임은 유저가 규정된 시간 안에 스크린에서 떨어지는 보너스 아이템을 눌러서 획득해야 하며, 시간이 종료되면 누른 만큼의 보너스를 획득하고, 보너스 아이템은 인벤토리에서 열면 보상을 얻을 수 있습니다

fmt: 4. The contents of red packs vary each time. Please check event info for more details.
fmt_tw: 4.每場天降紅包小遊戲會掉落不太一樣的紅包類內容，請留意活動主介面的顯示內容哦
fmt_en: 4. The contents of red packs vary each time. Please check event info for more details.
fmt_kr: 4. 보너스 미니 게임마다 뭔가 다른 보너스가 떨어지기도 합니다. 메인 화면의 내용을 주시해 주세요

fmt: 5. Coupons can be redeemed at Coupon screen. Players can also check rewards there.
fmt_tw: 5.兌獎券獲得後可在獎券入口進行刮獎，兌獎獎勵也在該入口裡進行公示
fmt_en: 5. Coupons can be redeemed at Coupon screen. Players can also check rewards there.
fmt_kr: 5. 교환권 획득 후 쿠폰 입구에서 추첨을 할 수 있습니다. 교환 보상 또한 해당 입구에서 전시됩니다

fmt: 6. Rewards will be sent through mail after the Mini-Game ends. Please pay attention to your inbox if you win any prize.
fmt_tw: 6.兌獎後，中獎的內容將在本場天降紅包小遊戲結束時採用郵件陸續進行發放，中獎的玩家請留意郵件內容
fmt_en: 6. Rewards will be sent through mail after the Mini-Game ends. Please pay attention to your inbox if you win any prize.
fmt_kr: 6. 보상 교환 후 당첨된 내용은 이번 보너스 미니 게임 종료 시 우편을 통해 지급해 드립니다. 당첨된 유저는 우편을 확인해 주세요

fmt: 7. If players failed to redeem them for rewards with the Coupons before a session of the mini game, the coupons will be redeemed and sent automatically to your inbox.
fmt_tw: 7.若玩家獲得兌獎券後，未來得及在本場天降紅包小遊戲結束時間前兌獎，則系統會自動進行刮獎與兌獎，並按時將獲獎郵件發放至郵箱
fmt_en: 7. If players failed to redeem them for rewards with the Coupons before a session of the mini game, the coupons will be redeemed and sent automatically to your inbox.
fmt_kr: 7. 만약 유저가 교환권을 얻었으나 이번 보너스 미니 게임 종료 전에 보상으로 교환하지 못했다면 시스템이 자동으로 추첨을 하고 교환을 진행하며 우편을 통해 보상을 지급해 드립니다

fmt: 1. This is a Snowman Making Mini-Game. The decorations and part ornaments unlocks as the snowman levels up.
fmt_tw: 1.活動是一個堆雪人的小遊戲，雪人有等級，隨著等級的提高會解鎖裝飾，以及雪人的部位裝扮
fmt_en: 1. This is a Snowman Making Mini-Game. The decorations and part ornaments unlocks as the snowman levels up.
fmt_kr: 1. 이벤트는 눈사람 만들기 미니 게임이며, 눈사람에는 레벨이 있습니다. 레벨에 따라 코스튬 및 눈사람의 부위 분장이 개방됩니다

fmt: 2. Collect exclusive snowflakes to make Pikachu snowman. Each snowflake used grant 1 random reward and level up Pikachu.
fmt_tw: 2.收集活動限定的雪花道具，可用在堆砌皮卡丘雪人上，每消耗1個道具堆砌，即可獲得1次隨機獎勵內容，同時皮卡丘會提升等級
fmt_en: 2. Collect exclusive snowflakes to make Pikachu snowman. Each snowflake used grant 1 random reward and level up Pikachu.
fmt_kr: 2. 이벤트 한정 눈꽃 아이템을 수집하면 피카츄 눈사람 만들기에 사용할 수 있습니다. 아이템 1개를 소모할 때마다 1회의 랜덤 보상을 얻으며, 동시에 피카츄의 레벨이 오릅니다

fmt: 3. Level up Pikachu to unlock Christmas decorations on certain parts. Players can change the color of the decorations. And at the meantime, some Christmas environment decorations will unlock.
fmt_tw: 3.皮卡丘的等級提升後，將解鎖身上部位的一些耶誕節裝飾，解鎖的部位可以隨意更換心儀顏色的裝飾，同時會固定解鎖一些耶誕節氣氛的環境裝飾
fmt_en: 3. Level up Pikachu to unlock Christmas decorations on certain parts. Players can change the color of the decorations. And at the meantime, some Christmas environment decorations will unlock.
fmt_kr: 3. 피카츄의 레벨이 오른 후 부위에서 일정 크리스마스 장식이 개방됩니다. 개방된 부위는 마음에 드는 색의 장식으로 변경할 수 있으며, 동시에 일정 크리스마스 분위기의 장식이 고정적으로 개방됩니다

fmt: 4. When level of Pikachu maxed, all the decorations and ornaments are unlocked. Players can still use snowflakes to get rewards.
fmt_tw: 4.皮卡丘的等級設定有上限，當等級達到上限後，就代表所有的裝飾物與裝扮將全部展示與開放，但此時仍可以對其消耗雪花道具，每次消耗同樣獲得獎勵
fmt_en: 4. When level of Pikachu maxed, all the decorations and ornaments are unlocked. Players can still use snowflakes to get rewards.
fmt_kr: 4. 피카츄의 레벨은 상한이 있으며, 레벨이 상한에 달하면 모든 장식이 개방됐다는 것을 의미합니다. 하지만 여전히 눈꽃 아이템을 사용할 수 있으며, 소모할 때마다 보상을 획득합니다

fmt: 1. Players can select from 3 Pokémon with different HP, Speed and Size to enter the Mini-Game.
fmt_tw: 1.小遊戲提供3個生命值、移動速度與體型都各不相同的精靈供選擇，每次開始遊戲前可以自由選擇自己擅長的精靈進入遊戲
fmt_en: 1. Players can select from 3 Pokémon with different HP, Speed and Size to enter the Mini-Game.
fmt_kr: 1. 미니 게임은 선택 가능한 3마리의 HP, 이동 속도 및 체형의 서로 다른 포켓몬이 제공되며, 게임이 시작하기 전에 자유롭게 자신 있는 포켓몬을 선택해 입장할 수 있습니다

fmt: 2. During the game, snowballs and gift boxes will drop from the sky. Hitting by a snowball will lose 1 HP and picking up gift boxes will get points. The game is over when the countdown ends or when the health is zero
fmt_tw: 2.遊戲開始後，會從天而降雪球與禮盒，被雪球砸1次會掉1點生命，撿到禮盒可得分，遊戲時間結束或被雪球砸至生命值為0時，遊戲結束
fmt_en: 2. During the game, snowballs and gift boxes will drop from the sky. Hitting by a snowball will lose 1 HP and picking up gift boxes will get points. The game is over when the countdown ends or when the health is zero
fmt_kr: 2. 게임 시작 후 하늘에서 스노우볼과 선물함이 떨어지며, 스노우볼에 1번 맞으면 HP가 1 감소합니다. 선물함을 줏으면 점수를 획득하며, 게임 시간이 끝나거나 스노우볼에 의해 HP가 0이 되면 게임이 종료됩니다

fmt: 3. #C0xF76B45#Snowballs and gift boxes are dropping very quickly. The snowballs will project a shadow on the ground while the gift boxes disappears soon. Pokémon will gain more point bonus if they live longer on the field.
fmt_tw: 3.#C0xF76B45#雪球下落極快，注意腳下陰影；禮盒落地後一會就會消失，需要儘快撿起，撿起可獲得積分；精靈在場上存活時間越長，還可獲得越多的積分加成哦
fmt_en: 3. #C0xF76B45#Snowballs and gift boxes are dropping very quickly. The snowballs will project a shadow on the ground while the gift boxes disappears soon. Pokémon will gain more point bonus if they live longer on the field.
fmt_kr: 3. #C0xF76B45#스노우볼은 매우 빠르게 떨어지니 발밑의 그림자를 주시하세요. 선물함은 떨어지고 나면 금방 사라지니 재빨리 주워서 점수를 얻어야 합니다. 포켓몬이 살아남은 시간이 길수록 더 많은 점수 보너스를 얻습니다

fmt: 4. Players can enjoy free Mini-Game attempts or purchase some with Diamonds.
fmt_tw: 4.每日小遊戲免費開放次數進入，也可以花費鑽石購買遊戲次數
fmt_en: 4. Players can enjoy free Mini-Game attempts or purchase some with Diamonds.
fmt_kr: 4. 매일 미니 게임은 무료 입장 횟수가 주어지며, 다이아를 소모해 게임 횟수를 구매할 수 있습니다

fmt: 5. The highest points in a single game will be recorded in the Leaderboard.
fmt_tw: 5.小遊戲設有排行榜，你的單局獲得積分的最高記錄將被進行排行展示
fmt_en: 5. The highest points in a single game will be recorded in the Leaderboard.
fmt_kr: 5. 미니 게임에는 랭킹이 있으며, 단일 게임 획득한 포인트의 최고 기록은 랭킹에 전시됩니다

fmt: 6. Accumulate points from games to get rewards.
fmt_tw: 6.小遊戲每局獲得的積分將會被累加記錄，達到一定的積分後可以領取相應獎勵內容
fmt_en: 6. Accumulate points from games to get rewards.
fmt_kr: 6. 미니 게임에서 획득한 포인트는 기록에 누적이 되며, 일정 포인트 누적 시 상응하는 보상을 수령할 수 있습니다

fmt: #C0xF76B45##L10#【Basic Rules】
fmt_tw: #C0xF76B45##L10#【基本規則】
fmt_en: #C0xF76B45##L10#【Basic Rules】
fmt_kr: #C0xF76B45##L10#[기본 규칙]

fmt: 1. Pokémon Quiz Opening Hours: #C0xF76B45#5:00 on Sat#C0x5B545B# to #C0xF76B45#24:00 on Sun#C0x5B545B#. Opens every two weeks.
fmt_tw: 1.精靈問答開放時間：#C0xF76B45#週六5:00#C0x5B545B#到#C0xF76B45#周日24:00#C0x5B545B#；每兩周開啟一次。
fmt_en: 1. Pokémon Quiz Opening Hours: #C0xF76B45#5:00 on Sat#C0x5B545B# to #C0xF76B45#24:00 on Sun#C0x5B545B#. Opens every two weeks.
fmt_kr: 1. 포켓몬 퀴즈 오픈 시간: #C0xF76B45#토요일 5:00#C0x5B545B#부터 #C0xF76B45#일요일 24:00#C0x5B545B#, 2주마다 1회 오픈합니다.

fmt: 2. Each player has 1 free chance to the Quiz. Once join, #C0xF76B45#even if the player quits halfway, the chance will be consumed#C0x5B545B#. Chance resets at 5am the next day.
fmt_tw: 2.精靈問答開放後，有1次免費進入答題的機會，進入答題即扣除次數#C0xF76B45#（中途退出也算作使用一次機會）#C0x5B545B#；次日05:00重置
fmt_en: 2. Each player has 1 free chance to the Quiz. Once join, #C0xF76B45#even if the player quits halfway, the chance will be consumed#C0x5B545B#. Chance resets at 5am the next day.
fmt_kr: 2. 포켓몬 퀴즈가 오픈하면 1회의 무료 퀴즈 정답 기회가 주어지며 진행 시 횟수가 차감됩니다#C0xF76B45#(도중에 퇴장 시 기회를 1회 사용한 것으로 간주합니다)#C0x5B545B#. 익일 05:00에 초기화됩니다

fmt: 3. Players can spend Diamonds for 1 extra chance. The leaderboard will only record the highest score.
fmt_tw: 3.每日消耗鑽石額外獲得1次答題機會，但兩次積分只能取較高的一次計入排行榜。
fmt_en: 3. Players can spend Diamonds for 1 extra chance. The leaderboard will only record the highest score.
fmt_kr: 3. 매일 다이아를 소모해 1회의 정답 기회를 얻을 수 있으며, 포인트는 2번 중 높은 포인트만 랭킹에 계산이 됩니다.

fmt: 4. Guild members can check rankings at leaderboard.
fmt_tw: 4.週六日的成績都會顯示在排名中，公會成員可看到自己和所在公會的排名。
fmt_en: 4. Guild members can check rankings at leaderboard.
fmt_kr: 4. 주말의 성적은 모두 순위에 공개되며, 길드 멤버는 자신 및 속한 길드의 순위를 확인할 수 있습니다.

fmt: #C0xF76B45##L10#【Quiz Rules】
fmt_tw: #C0xF76B45##L10#【答題規則】
fmt_en: #C0xF76B45##L10#【Quiz Rules】
fmt_kr: #C0xF76B45##L10#[정답 규칙]

fmt: 1. There are 15 questions. Only correctly answering the question can be scored. The less time spent, the higher the score.
fmt_tw: 1.整體問答共有15道題，回答錯誤或不回答為0積分；回答正確則可以獲得一定的相應積分，回答的用時越少且正確、則獲得的積分會更高
fmt_en: 1. There are 15 questions. Only correctly answering the question can be scored. The less time spent, the higher the score.
fmt_kr: 1. 모든 퀴즈는 15개이며, 오답 또는 답을 하지 않으면 0포인트를 얻습니다. 정답 시 일정의 포인트를 얻으며, 정답에 사용된 시간이 적을수록 획득하는 포인트가 많아집니다

fmt: 2. Players have 15 seconds to give their answer. The next question can be answered after countdown ends or answer is confirmed.
fmt_tw: 2.每道題有15秒的作答時間，倒計時結束或玩家提前確認答案後，則自動進入下一題
fmt_en: 2. Players have 15 seconds to give their answer. The next question can be answered after countdown ends or answer is confirmed.
fmt_kr: 2. 퀴즈마다 15초의 정답 시간이 주어지며, 카운트 다운이 종료되거나 유저가 그전에 답안을 확인하면 자동으로 다음 문제로 넘어갑니다

fmt: 3. Quiz types include text, picture and mini-game. Rules will be shown to the player who encounters the mini-game for the first time.
fmt_tw: 3.題目分為文字題，圖片題，小遊戲題；初次遇到小遊戲時，會有相關的規則說明。
fmt_en: 3. Quiz types include text, picture and mini-game. Rules will be shown to the player who encounters the mini-game for the first time.
fmt_kr: 3. 퀴즈는 문자, 그림, 미니 게임 문제로 나뉩니다. 처음으로 미니 게임이 나오면 관련 규칙 설명을 해드립니다.

fmt: 4. Leaderboard is ranked by points. Guild ranking is according to the total points of guild members (points of players who left Guild will be retained).
fmt_tw: 4.積分將作為排行榜排名的依據，公會排行是公會內所有玩家積分的總和進行排名(玩家退出公會後，已獲得積分仍會記錄在舊公會內)。
fmt_en: 4. Leaderboard is ranked by points. Guild ranking is according to the total points of guild members (points of players who left Guild will be retained).
fmt_kr: 4. 포인트는 랭킹 순위의 근거이며, 길드 순위는 길드의 모든 유저의 포인트 총합으로 결정됩니다(유저가 길드에서 탈퇴해도 이미 획득한 포인트는 이전 길드에 기록됩니다).

fmt: #C0xF76B45##L10#【Quiz Reward Rules】
fmt_tw: #C0xF76B45##L10#【答題獎勵規則】
fmt_en: #C0xF76B45##L10#【Quiz Reward Rules】
fmt_kr: #C0xF76B45##L10#[정답 보상 규칙]

fmt: Each correct answer grants a reward bag (up to 15 bags). They can be opened after Quiz ends.
fmt_tw: 答題者每回答正確一道題，都會獲得一個獎勵背包，最多可獲得15個，等到答題結束後統一開啟。
fmt_en: Each correct answer grants a reward bag (up to 15 bags). They can be opened after Quiz ends.
fmt_kr: 정답자는 퀴즈를 맞힐 때마다 보상 가방 1개를 얻으며 최대 15개까지 얻을 수 있습니다. 가방은 퀴즈가 종료된 후 일괄 오픈됩니다.

fmt: #C0xF76B45##L10#【Guild Ranking Reward】
fmt_tw: #C0xF76B45##L10#【公會排名獎勵規則】
fmt_en: #C0xF76B45##L10#【Guild Ranking Reward】
fmt_kr: #C0xF76B45##L10#[길드 순위 보상 규칙]

fmt: #C0xF76B45##L10#【Personal Ranking Reward】
fmt_tw: #C0xF76B45##L10#【個人排名獎勵規則】
fmt_en: #C0xF76B45##L10#【Personal Ranking Reward】
fmt_kr: #C0xF76B45##L10#[개인 순위 보상 규칙]

fmt: 1. When being matched up in the Cross-server Mall, you will see #C0xF76B45#Match Found. Please wait...#C0x5B545B#
fmt_tw: 1.跨服商業街需要等待伺服器間匹配，當匹配成功後，會在界面展示#C0xF76B45#匹配成功等待開賽狀態#C0x5B545B#
fmt_en: 1. When being matched up in the Cross-server Mall, you will see #C0xF76B45#Match Found. Please wait...#C0x5B545B#
fmt_kr: 1. 글로벌 상업 단지는 서버 간 매칭이 필요하며, 매칭 성공 시 메뉴에 #C0xF76B45#매칭 성공, 경기 시작 대기 상태#C0x5B545B#가 표시됩니다.

fmt: 2. Season Schedule #C0xF76B45#Announcement (lasts 1day) - Season Starts (10:00 on the next day, lasts 3 days) - Season Settlements Display (22:00 on the final day to one day before the next season starts)
fmt_tw: 2.賽季流程：#C0xF76B45#賽季預告（持續1日）——賽季開賽（隔日10:00，持續3天）—賽季結算展示（結束當日22：00至下次開賽前壹天）
fmt_en: 2. Season Schedule #C0xF76B45#Announcement (lasts 1day) - Season Starts (10:00 on the next day, lasts 3 days) - Season Settlements Display (22:00 on the final day to one day before the next season starts)
fmt_kr: 2. 시즌 과정: #C0xF76B45#시즌 예고(1일간 지속)——시즌 시작(격일 10:00, 3일간 지속)—시즌 결산 공개(종료 당일 22:00부터 다음 시작 1일 전까지)

fmt: 3. Personal rewards will be sent through mail #C0xF76B45#at 22:00 every day during the Season#C0x5B545B# according to ranking. #C0xF76B45#Server rewards will be sent by mail #C0xF76B45#at 22:00 on the final day#C0x5B545B#.
fmt_tw: 3.賽季中的#C0xF76B45#每日22:00以及賽季結束當日22:00#C0x5B545B#將根據排名將發放個人獎勵，#C0xF76B45#賽季結束當日22:00#C0x5B545B#還將結算伺服器獎勵，#C0xF76B45#所有內容均通過郵件領取
fmt_en: 3. Personal rewards will be sent through mail #C0xF76B45#at 22:00 every day during the Season#C0x5B545B# according to ranking. #C0xF76B45#Server rewards will be sent by mail #C0xF76B45#at 22:00 on the final day#C0x5B545B#.
fmt_kr: 3. 시즌 중에 #C0xF76B45#매일 22:00 및 시즌 종료 당일 22:00#C0x5B545B#에 순위에 따라 개인 보상을 지급하며, #C0xF76B45#시즌 종료 당일 22:00#C0x5B545B#에 서버 보상을 결산하며, #C0xF76B45#모든 내용물은 우편을 통해 수령할 수 있습니다

fmt: 4. #C0xF76B45#Players can only bid from 12:00 to 23:00 every day. No bid and revenge can be made during the truce period.
fmt_tw: 4.賽季中，#C0xF76B45#競標行為只可在每天10:00-22:00進行，其余時間為休戰期，休戰期間商鋪打烊，不可進行競標、復仇等戰鬥行為
fmt_en: 4. #C0xF76B45#Players can only bid from 12:00 to 23:00 every day. No bid and revenge can be made during the truce period.
fmt_kr: 4. 시즌 중에 #C0xF76B45#결투 행위는 매일 10:00~22:00에만 진행할 수 있으며, 나머지 시간은 휴전 기간입니다. 휴전 기간에 상점은 휴업을 하며 결투, 복수 등 전투 행위를 할 수 없습니다

fmt: 5. Players can enjoy free bidding, refreshing and revenge chances and can purchase more with Diamonds or Coins.
fmt_tw: 5.玩家有免費的競標次數，刷新競標玩家次數，以及復仇次數，超過次數可以使用鉆石或金幣購買
fmt_en: 5. Players can enjoy free bidding, refreshing and revenge chances and can purchase more with Diamonds or Coins.
fmt_kr: 5. 모든 유저에게 무료 결투 횟수, 결투 유저 새로 고침 횟수 및 복수 횟수가 주어지며, 횟수를 초과하면 다이아 또는 코인으로 구매할 수 있습니다

fmt: 6. Mall Zones are divided into #C0xF76B45#Advanced Zone and Common Zone according to ranking#C0x5B545B#. Players ranked No.1-10 will be placed in the Advanced Zone and the rest will be in the Common Zone.
fmt_tw: 6.商業街區根據排名劃分為#C0xF76B45#高級商業區與普通商業區#C0x5B545B#，排名在1-10的將被劃分在高級商業區內，其他則在普通街區內進行顯示
fmt_en: 6. Mall Zones are divided into #C0xF76B45#Advanced Zone and Common Zone according to ranking#C0x5B545B#. Players ranked No.1-10 will be placed in the Advanced Zone and the rest will be in the Common Zone.
fmt_kr: 6. 상업 단지는 순위에 따라 #C0xF76B45#고급 상업 단지 및 일반 상업 단지#C0x5B545B#로 나뉘며, 순위가 1-10이면 고급 상업 단지가 되고, 나머지는 일반 상업 단지로 분류됩니다

fmt: 8. Players can review battle video of high rank players in the Battle Intel
fmt_tw: 8.在對戰情報內，可提供檢視最近壹段時間內高段位玩家之間的對戰視頻
fmt_en: 8. Players can review battle video of high rank players in the Battle Intel
fmt_kr: 8. 대전 정보에서는 최근 일정 시간 동안 고랭크 유저 간의 대전 영상을 볼 수 있습니다.

fmt: 9. #C0xF76B45#The top 3 players#C0x5B545B# will get titles #C0xF76B45#at 22:00 every day and at the end of the season#C0x5B545B#. #C0xF76B45#The daily title is valid for 1 day and the seasonal title will be valid until the preparation period of the next Season.
fmt_en: 9. #C0xF76B45#The top 3 players#C0x5B545B# will get titles #C0xF76B45#at 22:00 every day and at the end of the season#C0x5B545B#. #C0xF76B45#The daily title is valid for 1 day and the seasonal title will be valid until the preparation period of the next Season.
fmt_kr: 9. 시즌 중에 #C0xF76B45#매일 및 시즌 종료 22:00의 결산 시#C0x5B545B# 결산 순위에 따른 칭호를 발급하며, 칭호는 각각 #C0xF76B45#랭킹 탑3의 유저#C0x5B545B#가 획득합니다. 시즌 중에#C0xF76B45#매일 결산으로 획득한 칭호의 유효 기간은 다음 매일 결산까지이며, 시즌 종료 결산으로 획득한 칭호의 유효 기간은 다음 시즌 매칭 준비까지입니다

fmt: 1. Resource Coins production speed and points bonus varies with different ranks. After getting new rank, #C0xF76B45#Resource Coins will be produced at the current produce speed and players will enjoy bonus points of the rank. Produce speed and bonus points are not stackable.
fmt_tw: 1.排名有對應的資源幣生產速度與加成積分，占用該排名後，#C0xF76B45#資源幣將按照現有生產速度產出，且將擁有本排名的加成積分，更換排名後，將直接替換生產速度與加成積分，並非疊加計算
fmt_en: 1. Resource Coins production speed and points bonus varies with different ranks. After getting new rank, #C0xF76B45#Resource Coins will be produced at the current produce speed and players will enjoy bonus points of the rank. Produce speed and bonus points are not stackable.
fmt_kr: 1. 순위는 상응하는 자원 코인 생산 속도 및 보너스 포인트가 있습니다. 해당 순위에 도달하면 #C0xF76B45# 자원 코인은 현재 생산 속도에 맞춰 생산이 되며, 이번 순위의 보너스 포인트가 적용됩니다. 순위가 바뀌면 생산 속도 및 보너스 포인트가 교체되고 중첩해서 계산되지 않습니다

fmt: 2. Resource Coins are produced all day. Bid with other players to get part of theirs. #C0xF76B45#Resource Coins can be used to purchase items at Shop or train stats in Bless.
fmt_tw: 2.資源幣按照配排名所在的速度全天產出，包括非休戰時期，與玩家競標可以獲得其部分的資源幣，#C0xF76B45#可用與商店道具購買與祝福中屬性培養
fmt_en: 2. Resource Coins are produced all day. Bid with other players to get part of theirs. #C0xF76B45#Resource Coins can be used to purchase items at Shop or train stats in Bless.
fmt_kr: 2. 자원 코인은 순위에 상응하는 속도로 종일 생산되며, 비휴전 시간도 포함됩니다. 유저와 결투 시 상대의 일부 자원 코인을 얻을 수 있으며 #C0xF76B45#상점에서 아이템 구매 및 축복으로 속성을 트레이닝 할 수 있습니다

fmt: 3. Points vary with ranks and can be earned by challenging and knockout time-limited Boss. Top 100 players are ranked by#C0xF76B45#the total points#C0x5B545B# from each server.
fmt_tw: 3.積分靠排名內更疊，以及限時BOSS戰中的戰鬥與擊殺獎勵產出，#C0xF76B45#積分用於賽季結算時，#C0x5B545B#取每個伺服器前100名的玩家的總積分值伺服器向後順序的排序
fmt_en: 3. Points vary with ranks and can be earned by challenging and knockout time-limited Boss. Top 100 players are ranked by#C0xF76B45#the total points#C0x5B545B# from each server.
fmt_kr: 3. 포인트는 순위에 따라 변경되며, 그리고 한정 보스전 중에서 전투 및 처치 보상에서 생성됩니다. #C0xF76B45#포인트는 시즌 결산에 사용되며, #C0x5B545B#서버 탑 100위의 유저의 총 포인트에 따라 서버의 순위가 결정됩니다

fmt: 1. Players can #C0xF76B45#deploy 3 teams before battle with up to 4 Pokémon each team.
fmt_tw: 1.對戰前，玩家可以#C0xF76B45#布陣3支隊伍，每支隊伍最多可上陣4個精靈
fmt_en: 1. Players can #C0xF76B45#deploy 3 teams before battle with up to 4 Pokémon each team.
fmt_kr: 1. 대전 전 유저는 #C0xF76B45#3개 파티의 라인업을 진행할 수 있으며, 최대 4마리의 포켓몬을 출전시킬 수 있습니다.

fmt: 2. #C0xF76B45#The team that wins two out of three battles wins. The status will not be retained to the next battle.
fmt_tw: 2.戰鬥實行每隊對戰計分模式，#C0xF76B45#3局2勝為最終勝利，最多3輪戰鬥，上壹輪的戰鬥結束後將不影響下壹輪
fmt_en: 2. #C0xF76B45#The team that wins two out of three battles wins. The status will not be retained to the next battle.
fmt_kr: 2. 전투는 팀마다 대전 계산 모드를 실행하며, #C0xF76B45#3판 2선승 시 최종 승리를 하고 최대 3턴 동안전투를 치릅니다. 이전 턴 전투 종료 후 다음 라운드에 영향을 주지 않습니다

fmt: 3. The player loses if all Pokémon of their 2 teams are knocked out. If there is no winner at the end of the round, #C0xF76B45#the defensive side wins.
fmt_tw: 3.壹方2隊的精靈全戰敗則判失敗，若小隊戰鬥的回合結束未分勝負的，則#C0xF76B45#判防守方的小隊本回合勝利
fmt_en: 3. The player loses if all Pokémon of their 2 teams are knocked out. If there is no winner at the end of the round, #C0xF76B45#the defensive side wins.
fmt_kr: 3. 한쪽의 2개 팀 포켓몬이 모두 쓰러진 경우 패배하며, 턴 종료까지 승부가 결정되지 않은 경우, 남은 #C0xF76B45#방어 측 팀이 승리합니다.

fmt: 4. Battle Mode of Cross-server Mall: #C0xF76B45#Locked Auto-fight#C0x5B545B#
fmt_tw: 4.跨服商業街的戰鬥方式為#C0xF76B45#鎖定自動戰鬥#C0x5B545B#
fmt_en: 4. Battle Mode of Cross-server Mall: #C0xF76B45#Locked Auto-fight#C0x5B545B#
fmt_kr: 4. 글로벌 상업 단지의 전투 방식은 #C0xF76B45#자동 전투 고정#C0x5B545B#입니다.

fmt: 5. If a player is challenged, the preset Defensive Lineup will meet head-on.
fmt_tw: 5.對方主動挑戰玩家時，將派出玩家的防守陣容迎戰
fmt_en: 5. If a player is challenged, the preset Defensive Lineup will meet head-on.
fmt_kr: 5. 상대가 유저에게 도전 시 유저의 방어 라인업을 사용해 응전합니다

fmt: 1. When a player initiates a bid and #C0xF76B45#defeats an opponent with higher rank, their ranks exchange and the winner gets the Production Speed and Bonus Points of that rank. If the player defeat an opponent with lower rank, he can only get some Resource Coins.
fmt_tw: 1.玩家主動發起競標，若#C0xF76B45#戰鬥勝利，則與高於自己排名的玩家交換位置，並繼承新排名的生產速度與加成積分，以及部分對手的資源幣；若與低排名對手對戰，則不交換排名及相關內容，可獲得部分對手的資源幣
fmt_en: 1. When a player initiates a bid and #C0xF76B45#defeats an opponent with higher rank, their ranks exchange and the winner gets the Production Speed and Bonus Points of that rank. If the player defeat an opponent with lower rank, he can only get some Resource Coins.
fmt_kr: 1. 유저가 자발적으로 결투를 하고 만약 #C0xF76B45#전투에서 승리한다면 자신보다 높은 순위의 유저와 위치를 바꾸고 새로운 순위의 생산 속도와 보너스 포인트를 이어받으며 상대의 자원 코인 일부를 얻습니다. 만약 순위가 낮은 상대와 대전하면 순위가 변경되지 않으며 상대의 자원 코인 일부를 획득합니다

fmt: 2. After being defeated, the player can take revenge and earn some Resource Coins from the target, but not the rank of the target. #C0xF76B45#Revenge attempts are limited.
fmt_tw: 2.對方發起戰鬥且戰鬥成功時，可以進行復仇，#C0xF76B45#對同壹個目標的復仇有次數上限，復仇也可獲得部分目標的資源幣，但是不互換排名，且可以觸發目標對自己的復仇
fmt_en: 2. After being defeated, the player can take revenge and earn some Resource Coins from the target, but not the rank of the target. #C0xF76B45#Revenge attempts are limited.
fmt_kr: 2. 상대방이 전투를 신청하고 전투에 성공하면 복수할 수 있습니다. #C0xF76B45#동일 상태에 대한 복수 횟수는 상한이 있으며, 복수 시 상대의 자원 코인 일부를 얻을 수 있습니다. 하지만 순위는 서로 바뀌지 않으며, 자신에 대한 상대방의 복수 또한 발동되지 않습니다

fmt: 3. Players cannot get Resource Coins in the following situations:
fmt_tw: 3.當出現以下情況時，競標或復仇目標即使成功也無法獲取資源幣：
fmt_en: 3. Players cannot get Resource Coins in the following situations:
fmt_kr: 3. 아래의 상황이 일어나면 결투 또는 복수를 성공 해도 자원 코인을 얻을 수 없습니다:

fmt: #C0xF76B45#①Max bidding attempts reached within 1 hour. The status is removed 1 hour after the last battle fought against.
fmt_tw: #C0xF76B45#①達到1小時內被競標次數上限時，最後1次被戰鬥離當前時間大於1小時解除該狀態
fmt_en: #C0xF76B45#①Max bidding attempts reached within 1 hour. The status is removed 1 hour after the last battle fought against.
fmt_kr: #C0xF76B45#①1시간 안에 결투 횟수가 상한에 도달할 시 마지막으로 전투를 당한 시간이 현재 시간보다 1시간 늦다면 해당 상태를 해제합니다

fmt: #C0xF76B45#②The power gap between players is too large.
fmt_tw: #C0xF76B45#②雙方的戰力值達到壹定比例的戰力差時
fmt_en: #C0xF76B45#②The power gap between players is too large.
fmt_kr: #C0xF76B45#②양측의 전투력 차이가 일정 비율보다 높을 시

fmt: #C0xF76B45#③Players come from the same server.
fmt_tw: #C0xF76B45#③雙方是同壹個伺服器的玩家時
fmt_en: #C0xF76B45#③Players come from the same server.
fmt_kr: #C0xF76B45#③양측이 같은 서버의 유저일 시

fmt: #C0xF76B45#④Max daily bidding attempts reached.
fmt_tw: #C0xF76B45#④達到每日被搶奪的次數上限時
fmt_en: #C0xF76B45#④Max daily bidding attempts reached.
fmt_kr: #C0xF76B45#④매일 결투의 횟수 상한에 달했을 시

fmt: 4. Players who lost Resource Coins or successfully revenged will get #C0xF76B45#5 minutes of bid-free protection.
fmt_tw: 4.被競標或復仇成功後的目標將會獲得#C0xF76B45#5分鐘的競標保護，5分鐘內不會再受到戰鬥
fmt_en: 4. Players who lost Resource Coins or successfully revenged will get #C0xF76B45#5 minutes of bid-free protection.
fmt_kr: 4. 결투 또는 복수를 당한 대상은 #C0xF76B45#5분간의 결투 보호를 받으며, 5분 안에 전투를 받지 않습니다

fmt: 1. During the event, Boss of Team Rocket will spawn in the Common Zone for players to challenge.
fmt_tw: 1.玩法持續時間內，會在普通商業區刷新可挑戰的火箭隊BOSS
fmt_en: 1. During the event, Boss of Team Rocket will spawn in the Common Zone for players to challenge.
fmt_kr: 1. 모드 지속 시간 안에 일반 상업 단지에서 도전 가능한 로켓단 보스가 새로 고침됩니다

fmt: 2. Bosses spawn at 12:30 and 18:30 with different difficulties.
fmt_tw: 2.BOSS刷新時間分別在中午12點30和晚上18點30，每個時間段刷新的BOSS難度不同
fmt_en: 2. Bosses spawn at 12:30 and 18:30 with different difficulties.
fmt_kr: 2. 보스 새로 고침 시간은 정오 12:30 및 저녁 18:30이며, 시간마다 다른 난이도의 보스가 새로 고침됩니다

fmt: 3. Players can enjoy free challenge attempts or purchase extra attempts.
fmt_tw: 3.每個玩家擁有一定挑戰BOSS的免費次數，也可以額外購買次數
fmt_en: 3. Players can enjoy free challenge attempts or purchase extra attempts.
fmt_kr: 3. 유저마다 일정 보스 도전 무료 기회가 주어지며, 추가 횟수를 구매할 수도 있습니다

fmt: 4. After each challenge, the HP of Boss will be deducted and the player receives a random reward. The player who dealt the last hit receives extra Knockout Reward. Ranking rewards are awarded according to the damage dealt.
fmt_tw: 4.玩家每次挑戰完成後扣除BOSS對應的血量同時獲得隨機獎勵，最後的擊殺者可獲得額外的擊殺獎勵，BOSS被擊殺後按照造成傷害的高低發放排名獎勵
fmt_en: 4. After each challenge, the HP of Boss will be deducted and the player receives a random reward. The player who dealt the last hit receives extra Knockout Reward. Ranking rewards are awarded according to the damage dealt.
fmt_kr: 4. 유저마다 도전 완료 후 보스에게 입힌 피해량에 따라 랜덤 보상을 얻으며, 마지막 일격을 가한 유저는 추가 처치 보상을 얻습니다. 보스가 처치당하면 입힌 피해량에 따라 순위 보상을 지급합니다

fmt: 5. The server of the last-hit dealer receives extra bonus (One of three effects: Stats Boost, Production Boost, Snatch Boost).
fmt_tw: 5.擊殺BOSS的玩家所在得伺服器會獲得額外加成，分別有屬性增強，產出增加，搶奪增加三種效果中的一種
fmt_en: 5. The server of the last-hit dealer receives extra bonus (One of three effects: Stats Boost, Production Boost, Snatch Boost).
fmt_kr: 5. 보스를 처치한 유저가 있는 서버는 추가 보너스를 얻으며, 각각 속성 강화, 생산 증가, 쟁탈 증가 3가지 효과 중 1개를 얻습니다.

fmt: 6. Boss that spawns at night can be very powerful. But the bonus the server gets is also great.
fmt_tw: 6.晚上的BOSS會格外強大，BOSS被擊殺後擊殺者所在伺服器玩家獲得的加成也會格外給力
fmt_en: 6. Boss that spawns at night can be very powerful. But the bonus the server gets is also great.
fmt_kr: 6. 저녁의 보스는 특별히 더 강하며, 보스가 처치되면 처치자가 있는 서버의 유저가 획득하는 보너스도 특별히 더 좋아집니다

fmt: 1. New Year Lucky Event is coming! Complete quests to get massive rewards!
fmt_tw: 1.新年限定集福活動上線！活動時間內，完成任務可得海量好禮！
fmt_en: 1. New Year Lucky Event is coming! Complete quests to get massive rewards!
fmt_kr: 1. 신년 한정 새해복 이벤트가 찾아옵니다! 이벤트 동안 퀘스트를 완료하면 푸짐한 선물을 드립니다!

fmt: 2. There are 16 quests in the event. Each quest has a number that corresponds to the puzzle number on the right.
fmt_tw: 2.活動期間，共有16個任務累計進度，每個任務都有號碼，號碼對應右邊的拼圖號碼
fmt_en: 2. There are 16 quests in the event. Each quest has a number that corresponds to the puzzle number on the right.
fmt_kr: 2. 이벤트 동안 총 16개의 퀘스트 누적 진행도가 있으며, 퀘스트마다 번호가 주어지고, 번호는 우측의 퍼즐 번호와 매칭됩니다

fmt: 3. Complete quests to get rewards and flip the corresponding card.
fmt_tw: 3.每完成對應號碼的任務，可以獲得任務獎勵，同時對應牌面將被翻開
fmt_en: 3. Complete quests to get rewards and flip the corresponding card.
fmt_kr: 3. 상응하는 번호의 퀘스트를 완료하면 퀘스트 보상을 획득하며 동시에 상응하는 카드도 뒤집힙니다

fmt: 4. There are 8 Lucky Pockets below or in the right of the puzzle. Complete related quests to flip the cards and get rewards.
fmt_tw: 4.拼圖的右邊、下方對應展示8個福袋禮物，完成對應直線號牌的任務，翻開牌面的可以獲得福袋獎勵
fmt_en: 4. There are 8 Lucky Pockets below or in the right of the puzzle. Complete related quests to flip the cards and get rewards.
fmt_kr: 4. 퍼즐의 우측, 하단에 8개의 복주머니 선물이 전시되며, 상응하는 라인의 번호 퀘스트를 완료하고 카드를 뒤집으면 복주머니 보상을 얻을 수 있습니다

fmt: 5. Big Lucky Pocket will be granted after all 16 puzzle numbers are flipped!
fmt_tw: 5.16張拼圖號碼全部翻開後，可獲得超大福袋獎勵哦！
fmt_en: 5. Big Lucky Pocket will be granted after all 16 puzzle numbers are flipped!
fmt_kr: 5. 16장의 퍼즐 번호가 전부 뒤집히면 특대 복주머니 보상을 얻을 수 있습니다!

fmt: 1. Players can join House Building few times every day.
fmt_tw: 1.活動時間內，每天限定次數可進入摩天高樓搭建小遊戲進行遊玩
fmt_en: 1. Players can join House Building few times every day.
fmt_kr: 1. 이벤트 동안에 매일 한정된 빌딩 건설 미니 게임 플레이 횟수가 주어집니다

fmt: 2. #C0xF76B45#Players should build their houses perfectly within the given time. There are 3 chances per game. Please use them well.
fmt_tw: 2.小遊戲要求在一定的操作時間內，#C0xF76B45#儘量使搭建的樓層完美搭建，以完成高樓的建設，每局遊戲有3次搭建機會，要好好使用
fmt_en: 2. #C0xF76B45#Players should build their houses perfectly within the given time. There are 3 chances per game. Please use them well.
fmt_kr: 2. 미니 게임은 일정 조작 시간 안에 #C0xF76B45#최대한 빌딩을 퍼펙트 건설하여 진행해야 합니다. 판마다 3회의 건설 기회가 주어지니 잘 활용하세요

fmt: 3. #C0xF76B45#Random rewards appear during the building process. Complete the building of that floor to get the rewards. #C0x5B545B#Rewards will be displayed at the final settlement.
fmt_tw: 3.搭建過程中，會#C0xF76B45#隨機出現搭建獎勵，只要能成功搭建本樓層，即可獲得該獎勵，#C0x5B545B#獎勵會在最後的遊戲結算裡進行統計展示
fmt_en: 3. #C0xF76B45#Random rewards appear during the building process. Complete the building of that floor to get the rewards. #C0x5B545B#Rewards will be displayed at the final settlement.
fmt_kr: 3. 건설 과정에서 #C0xF76B45#랜덤으로 건설 보상이 출현합니다. 해당 층을 성공적으로 건설해야 해당 보상을 얻을 수 있으며, #C0x5B545B#보상은 마지막 게임 결산에서 집계 후 공개됩니다

fmt: 4. #C0xF76B45#The taller the house or better the building, the higher the rating.
fmt_tw: 4.搭建還有搭建評分考量，#C0xF76B45#樓層越高，搭建越完美，評分則會越高哦
fmt_en: 4. #C0xF76B45#The taller the house or better the building, the higher the rating.
fmt_kr: 4. 건설 시 건설 평점을 하며, #C0xF76B45#건물이 높고 완벽할수록 평점이 높아집니다

fmt: 5. Info of each mini-game, including rating, floors built and perfect buildings will be recorded in the Emblem Quest. #C0xF76B45#Complete quests to get rewards and emblem points. Upgrade the emblem to get more rewards.
fmt_tw: 5.每局摩天高樓小遊戲的評分、搭建層數、完美搭建出現次數將被累計記錄在勳章任務內，#C0xF76B45#完成對應任務可獲得任務獎勵與勳章積分，升級勳章還將獲得升級獎勵哦
fmt_en: 5. Info of each mini-game, including rating, floors built and perfect buildings will be recorded in the Emblem Quest. #C0xF76B45#Complete quests to get rewards and emblem points. Upgrade the emblem to get more rewards.
fmt_kr: 5. 빌딩 건설 미니 게임 평점, 건설 높이, 퍼펙트 건설 횟수는 배지 퀘스트 안에 기록되며, #C0xF76B45#상응하는 퀘스트를 완료하면 퀘스트 보상 및 배지 포인트를 얻을 수 있으며, 배지를 업그레이드하면 업그레이드 보상 또한 얻을 수 있습니다

fmt: 6. Leaderboard shows the records of players from different servers according to their ratings and floors built.
fmt_tw: 6.排行榜將展示多個伺服器內玩家們的成績，根據搭建評分與搭建層數進行排名展示
fmt_en: 6. Leaderboard shows the records of players from different servers according to their ratings and floors built.
fmt_kr: 6. 랭킹은 여러 서버의 유저들의 성적이 공개되며, 건설 평점 및 건설 높이에 따라 순위가 정해집니다

fmt: 1. Complete Daily Quests to get Activity. The higher the Activity, the greater the unlocked Pass Rewards.
fmt_tw: 1.完成日常任務可獲取活躍度，累計的活躍度越高，解鎖的通行證獎勵越豐厚
fmt_en: 1. Complete Daily Quests to get Activity. The higher the Activity, the greater the unlocked Pass Rewards.

fmt: 2. Purchase Deluxe Pass to unlock extra valuable rewards.
fmt_tw: 2.購買豪華版通行證，可以解鎖更多額外的超值獎勵
fmt_en: 2. Purchase Deluxe Pass to unlock extra valuable rewards.

fmt: 3. Purchased Deluxe Pass is only valid during the corresponding event. Accumulated Activity will be cleared at the end of event.
fmt_tw: 3.每期購買的豪華版通行證僅在本期活動內生效，下次活動需要重新購買；累計的活躍度也會在活動結束時清零
fmt_en: 3. Purchased Deluxe Pass is only valid during the corresponding event. Accumulated Activity will be cleared at the end of event.

fmt: 4. At the end of event, all unclaimed rewards will be sent through mail.
fmt_tw: 4.通行證活動結束時，所有未領取的獎勵將通過郵件發送
fmt_en: 4. At the end of event, all unclaimed rewards will be sent through mail.

fmt: 1. Accumulate cleared floors (challenge final Boss of each floor) at Aether Paradise every day to unlock generous Pass Rewards.
fmt_tw: 1.每天通過以太樂園，累計通過層數(每層最終BOSS挑戰結束才可累計層數)，可解鎖豐厚的通行證獎勵
fmt_en: 1. Accumulate cleared floors (challenge final Boss of each floor) at Aether Paradise every day to unlock generous Pass Rewards.

fmt: 2. Purchase Deluxe Pass to unlock extra valuable rewards.
fmt_tw: 2.購買豪華版通行證，可以解鎖更多額外的超值獎勵
fmt_en: 2. Purchase Deluxe Pass to unlock extra valuable rewards.

fmt: 3. Purchased Deluxe Pass is only valid during the event of the session. Accumulated cleared floors will be cleared at the end of event.
fmt_tw: 3.每期購買的豪華版通行證僅在本期活動內生效，下次活動需要重新購買；累計的通過層數也會在活動結束時清零
fmt_en: 3. Purchased Deluxe Pass is only valid during the event of the session. Accumulated cleared floors will be cleared at the end of event.

fmt: 4. At the end of event, all unclaimed rewards will be sent through mail.
fmt_tw: 4.通行證活動結束時，所有未領取的獎勵將通過郵件發送
fmt_en: 4. At the end of event, all unclaimed rewards will be sent through mail.

fmt: #C0xFF5B545B#1. Successfully challenge Gym Dungeon weekly to accumulate challenge chances (#C0xF76B45#challenging players is not included#C0xFF5B545B#). The more accumulated challenge chances, the greater the unlocked Pass Rewards.
fmt_tw: #C0xFF5B545B#1.每週成功挑戰道館副本，可累計挑戰次數(#C0xF76B45#挑戰道館玩家不計次數#C0xFF5B545B#)；累計的挑戰次數越多，解鎖的通行證獎勵越豐厚
fmt_en: #C0xFF5B545B#1. Successfully challenge Gym Dungeon weekly to accumulate challenge chances (#C0xF76B45#challenging players is not included#C0xFF5B545B#). The more accumulated challenge chances, the greater the unlocked Pass Rewards.
fmt_kr: #C0xFF5B545B#1.매주 체육관 던전 도전 성공 시 도전 횟수가 적립될 수 있습니다 (#C0xF76B45#체육관 유저 도전 시 적립되지 않음#C0xFF5B545B#)；적립된 도전 횟수가 많을 수록 활성화된 패스 보상은 푸짐합니다.

fmt: 2. Purchase Deluxe Pass to unlock extra valuable rewards.
fmt_tw: 2.購買豪華版通行證，可以解鎖更多額外的超值獎勵
fmt_en: 2. Purchase Deluxe Pass to unlock extra valuable rewards.
fmt_kr: 2. 호화 패스를 구매 시 추가로 대량의 보상을 획득 가능합니다

fmt: 3. Purchased Deluxe Pass is only valid during the corresponding event. Accumulated challenge chances will be cleared at the end of event.
fmt_tw: 3.每期購買的豪華版通行證僅在本期活動內生效，下次活動需要重新購買；累計的副本挑戰次數也會在活動結束時清零
fmt_en: 3. Purchased Deluxe Pass is only valid during the corresponding event. Accumulated challenge chances will be cleared at the end of event.
fmt_kr: 3. 매회 구매하신 호화 패스는 해당 이벤트 기간에 유효하여 다음 이벤트에 다시 구매 필요합니다. 누적 던전의 도전 횟수도 이벤트 종료 시 초기화됩니다.

fmt: 4. At the end of event, all unclaimed rewards will be sent through mail.
fmt_tw: 4.通行證活動結束時，所有未領取的獎勵將通過郵件發送
fmt_en: 4. At the end of event, all unclaimed rewards will be sent through mail.
fmt_kr: 4. 패스 이벤트 종료시 모든 미수령 보상은 우편으로 지급합니다

fmt: 1. Roll dice to move. There are treasure chests on the map. #C0xF76B45# Having various rewards and will be randomly appear on the map again after obtained. Take chasing treasure chests as your goal!
fmt_tw: 1.投擲骰子進行移動，地圖上有寶箱，#C0xF76B45#它獎勵豐富且在獲得之後會隨機在地圖上再次顯示，把追逐寶箱作為你的目標吧！
fmt_en: 1. Roll dice to move. There are treasure chests on the map. #C0xF76B45# Having various rewards and will be randomly appear on the map again after obtained. Take chasing treasure chests as your goal!

fmt: 2. When moving on the map, you will encounter other event squares. On the map interface #C0xF76B45# tap on the event square to view specific instructions
fmt_tw: 2.在地圖上行進時，還會遇到其他的事件格子，在地圖介面上#C0xF76B45#點擊事件格子可以查看具體說明
fmt_en: 2. When moving on the map, you will encounter other event squares. On the map interface #C0xF76B45# tap on the event square to view specific instructions

fmt: 3. In the event square, #C0xF76B45# small shop and treasure chests will trigger events as passing through. After the #C0x5B545B# event ends, if Ash can move, then move forward. #C0xF76B45# Other event squares triggering are required stay
fmt_tw: 3.事件格子中，#C0xF76B45#小店和寶箱只要途徑便會觸發事件，#C0x5B545B#事件結束之後，小智若還可移動，則再接著向前移動；#C0xF76B45#其他的事件格子則需要停駐才會觸發
fmt_en: 3. In the event square, #C0xF76B45# small shop and treasure chests will trigger events as  passing through. After the #C0x5B545B# event ends, if Ash can move, then move forward.  #C0xF76B45# Other event squares triggering are required stay

fmt: 4. In the Grand Adventure, you can get #C0xF76B45# explorer medal, #C0x5B545B# allows you to purchase items when #C0xF76B45# passes through the shop. Noice, it can only be used to purchase items that can be used in Grand Adventure
fmt_tw: 4.在大冒險中，你可以獲得#C0xF76B45#探險者勳章，#C0x5B545B#它可以讓你在#C0xF76B45#途徑小店時進行道具購買，注意，它只可以用來購買大冒險中可以使用的道具
fmt_en: 4. In the Grand Adventure, you can get #C0xF76B45# explorer medal, #C0x5B545B# allows you to purchase items when #C0xF76B45# passes through the shop. Noice, it can only be used to purchase items that can be used in Grand Adventure

fmt: 5. During the adventure, you will get some unique item cards and dice. If you don’t know their usefulness, you can check the item description below #C0xF76B45#
fmt_tw: 5.冒險途中，會獲得一些各有特色的道具卡和骰子，如果不知道他們的用處，#C0xF76B45#可以查看下方的道具說明
fmt_en: 5. During the adventure, you will get some unique item cards and dice. If you don’t know their usefulness, you can check the item description below #C0xF76B45#

fmt: #L10##C0xF76B45# "Separation is always sad, but reunion is always happy." #C0xFF5B545B#——Trainers from all over the world with their Pokémon came to join the annual Pokémon racing season.
fmt_tw: #L10##C0xF76B45#"總是當時攜手處，今年花勝去年紅"。#C0xFF5B545B#——來自世界各地的訓練家們帶著他們的精靈，開始了一年一度的精靈賽跑季。
fmt_en: #L10##C0xF76B45# "Separation is always sad, but reunion is always happy." #C0xFF5B545B#——Trainers from all over the world with their Pokémon came to join the annual Pokémon racing season.

fmt: The entire elf racing season includes four stages: prize guessing, pre-match preparation, competition in progress, and result announcement.
fmt_tw: 整個精靈賽跑季包括：有獎競猜、賽前準備、比賽進行中、結果公佈等四個階段。
fmt_en: The entire elf racing season includes four stages: prize guessing, pre-match preparation, competition in progress, and result announcement.

fmt: #L10##C0xF76B45#[Guess with prize]:
fmt_en: #L10##C0xF76B45#[Guess with prize]:

fmt: 1. During the opening period of the event, there will be two rounds of competition (12:00 and 20:00) every day during the Pokémon racing season. In each game, 4 Pokémons will be randomly selected for the race.
fmt_tw: 1.活動開啟期間，精靈賽跑季每天兩輪比賽(12:00和20:00點)，每場比賽會隨機選取4名精靈進行賽跑比試。
fmt_en: 1. During the opening period of the event, there will be two rounds of competition (12:00 and 20:00) every day during the Pokémon racing season. In each game, 4 Pokémons will be randomly selected for the race.

fmt: 2. Although trainers cannot participate with Pokémons, they can make a prize guessing before the start of the match. Results of the guessing will be announced at the end of the match.
fmt_tw: 2.訓練家們雖然不能和精靈一同參與訓練，但是可以在比賽開始前進行有獎競猜；競猜結果會在比賽結束時發佈。
fmt_en: 2. Although trainers cannot participate with Pokémons, they can make a prize guessing before the start of the match. Results of the guessing will be announced at the end of the match.

fmt: 3. The time for the prize-winning guessing is: 05:00~11:57 and 13:00~19:57 every day, prize guessing are not available in other time periods.
fmt_tw: 3.有獎競猜的時間分別為: 每日05:00~11:57和13:00~19:57;且其他時間段內是無法進行競猜的。
fmt_en: 3. The time for the prize-winning guessing is: 05:00~11:57 and 13:00~19:57 every day, prize guessing are not available in other time periods.

fmt: 4. Guess betting requires a certain amount of diamonds, and only one Pokémon are available to select for betting in each guessing.
fmt_tw: 4.競猜下注需要消耗一定的鑽石，且每次競猜最多只能選擇一名精靈進行下注。
fmt_en: 4. Guess betting requires a certain amount of diamonds, and only one Pokémon are available to select for betting in each guessing.

fmt: #L10##C0xF76B45#[Pre-match preparation]
fmt_tw: #L10##C0xF76B45#【賽前準備】
fmt_en: #L10##C0xF76B45#[Pre-match preparation]

fmt: 1. During the preparation phase, it will take 3 minutes, during this time prize guessing will be closed
fmt_tw: 1.比賽準備階段，需要耗時3分鐘，期間有獎競猜將會被關閉。
fmt_en: 1. During the preparation phase, it will take 3 minutes, during this time prize guessing will be closed

fmt: #L10##C0xF76B45#[Match in progress] :
fmt_tw: #L10##C0xF76B45#【比賽進行中】:
fmt_en: #L10##C0xF76B45#[Match in progress] :

fmt: 1. The game starts at 12:00 and 20:00 every day, and the whole process will last for 3 minutes.
fmt_tw: 1.每日12:00和20:00準時開始比賽，整個過程將持續3分種。
fmt_en: 1. The game starts at 12:00 and 20:00 every day, and the whole process will last for 3 minutes.

fmt: 2. The body ability of different Pokémon is different, Speed and Sprint rate is two more important indicators.
fmt_tw: 2.不同精靈選手的身體指標會有所不同，速度和衝刺概率將是兩項比較重要的指標。
fmt_en: 2. The body ability of different Pokémon is different, Speed and Sprint rate is two more important indicators.

fmt: 3. Description of various indicators:
fmt_tw: 3.各項指標說明：
fmt_en: 3. Description of various indicators:

fmt: a. Speed, the initial race speed of Pokémon
fmt_tw: a.速度，精靈的初始賽跑速度
fmt_en: a. Speed, the initial race speed of Pokémon

fmt: b. Stamina. Pokémon will continue to consume physical strength during the game. When the physical strength is insufficient, it will enter a weak state (the speed will be affected and reduced in the weak state); when Stamina restores to sufficient, the weak state will disappear.
fmt_tw: b.體力，精靈在比賽過程中會持續消耗體力，體力不足時，會進入虛弱狀態（虛弱狀態下速度將會受影響有所下降);體力恢復至充足時，虛弱狀態將會消失。
fmt_en: b. Stamina. Pokémon will continue to consume physical strength during the game. When the physical strength is insufficient, it will enter a weak state (the speed will be affected and reduced in the weak state); when Stamina restores to sufficient, the weak state will disappear.

fmt: c. Sprint rate, Pokémon will have a certain probability of sprinting during the game, and the real-time speed will be increased by a corresponding multiple
fmt_tw: c.衝刺概率，精靈在比賽過程中每隔一段時間將有一定概率進行衝刺，即時速度會提高相應的倍數
fmt_en: c. Sprint rate, Pokémon will have a certain probability of sprinting during the game, and the real-time speed will be increased by a corresponding multiple

fmt: d. Sprint duration, the duration when Pokémon triggers sprinting
fmt_tw: d.衝刺持續時間，精靈觸發衝刺時所持續的時間
fmt_en: d. Sprint duration, the duration when Pokémon triggers sprinting

fmt: #L10##C0xF76B45#[Result announcement]:
fmt_en: #L10##C0xF76B45#[Result announcement]:

fmt: 1. The game will end when all Pokémons reach the finish line.
fmt_tw: 1.比賽將會在所有精靈在到達終點時結束。
fmt_en: 1. The game will end when all Pokémons reach the finish line.

fmt: 2. At the end of the game, trainers can receive the guessing rewards in the [historical game] (trainers who have not guessed will not have any rewards), and they can also replay the game process.
fmt_tw: 2.比賽結束時，訓練家們可以在【歷史比賽】中領取競猜獎勵(沒有競猜過的訓練師將沒有任何獎勵)，也可以重播比賽過程。
fmt_en: 2. At the end of the game, trainers can receive the guessing rewards in the [historical game] (trainers who have not guessed will not have any rewards), and they can also replay the game process.

fmt: 3. The guessing reward includes two parts: guess points and item rewards. trainers can receive corresponding stage rewards in [Point Reward] by accumulate guess points.
fmt_tw: 3.競猜獎勵包括兩部分：競猜積分、道具獎勵；累計一定的競猜積分，可以在【積分獎勵】中領取相應的階段性獎勵。
fmt_en: 3. The guessing reward includes two parts: guess points and item rewards. trainers can  receive corresponding stage rewards in [Point Reward] by accumulate guess points.

fmt: #L10#4. Guess reward preview:
fmt_tw: #L10#4.競猜獎勵預覽：
fmt_en: #L10#4. Guess reward preview:

fmt: #C0xF76B45#[Basic Rules]
fmt_tw: #C0xF76B45#【基礎規則】
fmt_en: #C0xF76B45#[Basic Rules]

fmt: 1. During the event, you can start challenge for limited attempts per day for Brave Challenge
fmt_tw: 1.活動期間內，每天恢復3次挑戰次數，次數恢復時間為淩晨5點，次數累計上限為10次
fmt_en: 1. During the event, you can start challenge for limited attempts per day for Brave Challenge

fmt: 2. At the beginning of the process, you can choose three Pokémons as the starting line up
fmt_tw: 2.寶可夢挑戰開始，可任選三隻精靈作為首發精靈
fmt_en: 2. At the beginning of the process, you can choose three Pokémons as the starting line up

fmt: 3. Some Pokémons have special unlocking conditions and need to be unlocked before use
fmt_tw: 3.特殊首發精靈有特殊解鎖條件，需要解鎖後才能使用
fmt_en: 3. Some Pokémons have special unlocking conditions and need to be unlocked before use

fmt: 4. Before challenging the level, you can adjust on battle Pokémon according to the enemy's information
fmt_tw: 4.挑戰關卡前可根據敵方資訊進行調整上陣精靈
fmt_en: 4. Before challenging the level, you can adjust on battle Pokémon according to the enemy's information

fmt: 5. After winning each battle, you can choose one of the three optional medals
fmt_tw: 5.每場戰鬥勝利後可以從三個可選勳章中任選一個
fmt_en: 5. After winning each battle, you can choose one of the three optional medals

fmt: 6. The medal plays a decisive role in the battle, so choose carefully
fmt_tw: 6.連續使用3次相同的首發精靈陣容進行挑戰可開局獲得勳章獎勵；每日首次挑戰也會有額外勳章獎勵，不要錯過
fmt_en: 6. The medal plays a decisive role in the battle, so choose carefully

fmt: 7. Defeat the final BOSS to complete this round, and record the number of passes and rounds
fmt_tw: 7.勳章對戰鬥起到決定性的作用，所以要謹慎選擇
fmt_en: 7. Defeat the final BOSS to complete this round, and record the number of passes and rounds

fmt: 8. During the event, the progress of the challenge will be saved, and the process will be reset after clearance or challenge fails
fmt_tw: 8.打敗最終的BOSS即完成本輪次的通關，記錄通關次數和回合
fmt_en: 8. During the event, the progress of the challenge will be saved, and the process will be reset after clearance or challenge fails

fmt: 9. During the event, consume attempts, repeat challenges, complete achievements, and achieve new breakthroughs
fmt_tw: 9.活動期間，挑戰進度會保存，完成通關或挑戰失敗會重置流程
fmt_en: 9. During the event, consume attempts, repeat challenges, complete achievements, and achieve new breakthroughs

fmt: 10. During event, consume attempts to challenge repeatedly, complete achievements and achieve new breakthrough
fmt_tw: 10.活動期間，消耗次數，可重複挑戰，完成成就，實現新的突破
fmt_en: 10. During event, consume attempts to challenge repeatedly, complete achievements and achieve new breakthrough

fmt: #C0xF76B45#[Battle Rules]
fmt_tw: #C0xF76B45#【戰鬥規則】
fmt_en: #C0xF76B45#[Battle Rules]

fmt: 1. At the end of the battle, all the Pokémons' HP and the anger of starting line up Pokémons will be retained. Pokémons recruited in the middle will have a fixed anger each time they participate in the battle.
fmt_tw: 1.戰鬥結束會保留己方全部精靈血量和首發精靈的怒氣，中途招募的精靈每次參戰都為固定怒氣
fmt_en: 1. At the end of the battle, all the Pokémons' HP and the anger of starting line up Pokémons will be retained. Pokémons recruited in the middle will have a fixed anger each time they participate in the battle.

fmt: 2. If Pokémons are killed in battle, they cannot enter battle again
fmt_tw: 2.戰鬥過程中精靈陣亡，則不可再上陣
fmt_en: 2. If Pokémons are killed in battle, they cannot enter battle again

fmt: 3. Cleared stages cannot be repeated challenges
fmt_tw: 3.戰鬥勝利後的關卡不可重複挑戰
fmt_en: 3. Cleared stages cannot be repeated challenges

fmt: #C0xF76B45#[Reward Rules]
fmt_tw: #C0xF76B45#【獎勵規則】
fmt_en: #C0xF76B45#[Reward Rules]

fmt: 1. The #C0xF76B45# After event ends, all achievement rewards will not be reissued, please be sure to collect before the event ends#C0x5B545B#
fmt_tw: 1.#C0xF76B45#活動結束，所有成就獎勵不補發，請務必在活動結束前領取#C0x5B545B#
fmt_en: 1. The #C0xF76B45# After event ends, all achievement rewards will not be reissued, please be sure to collect before the event ends#C0x5B545B#

fmt: 2. You can get first clearance reward after stage first clearance. Repeat challenges can get challenge rewards after clearance
fmt_tw: 2.首次通關時，可獲得首次通關獎勵，通關後，重複挑戰可獲得挑戰獎勵
fmt_en: 2. You can get first clearance reward after stage first clearance. Repeat challenges can get challenge rewards after clearance

fmt: 3. During event, the limit of coins obtain by stage challenge is #Icommon/icon/icon_gold.png-56-56#8000000
fmt_tw: 3.活動持續期間，副本挑戰獲得的金幣上限為#Icommon/icon/icon_gold.png-56-56#8000000
fmt_en: 3. During event, the limit of coins obtain by stage challenge is #Icommon/icon/icon_gold.png-56-56#8000000

fmt: #L10##C0xF76B45#[Pack Rules]
fmt_tw: #L10##C0xF76B45#【禮包規則】
fmt_en: #L10##C0xF76B45#[Pack Rules]

fmt: 1. Customized giftpack will be according to the trainer's own situation before the gift package appears
fmt_tw: 1.根據禮包出現前訓練家的自身情況，來定制專屬禮包
fmt_en: 1. Customized giftpack will be according to the trainer's own situation before the gift package appears

fmt: 2. Gift packs are time limited on sale, so don’t miss this chance
fmt_tw: 2.禮包限時出售，訓練家們不要錯失良機
fmt_en: 2. Gift packs are time limited on sale, so don’t miss this chance

fmt: 3. Gift packs is a one-time release, no new gift packs will be added to the exclusive limit
fmt_tw: 3.禮包是一次性投放，不會再有新的禮包加入到尊享限定
fmt_en: 3. Gift packs is a one-time release, no new gift packs will be added to the exclusive limit

fmt: 4. System will customize a more high-quality gift pack in your follow-up improvement, so stay tuned
fmt_tw: 4.訓練家在後續提升的自身實力，會在下次尊享開啟時再為您定制更優質的禮包，敬請期待
fmt_en: 4. System will customize a more high-quality gift pack in your follow-up improvement, so stay tuned

fmt: #C0xF76B45#[Basic Rules]
fmt_tw: #C0xF76B45#【基礎規則】
fmt_en: #C0xF76B45#[Basic Rules]

fmt: 1. Z Awakening training can improve the attributes of elves
2. In a certain stage of Z awakening, the spirit's skills will be strengthened by a second awakening
3. It is shared with the Z Awakening training of Elves of the Evolution series (excluding Super Evolution).
4. After the elves undergo z-awakening training, the level of awakening power can be improved, and more additional team attribute bonuses can be obtained
5. After super-evolving, the old elf Z awakening training will be automatically reset, and the super-evolved elves need to re-upgrade Z awakening
6. Z awakening fragments are a new type of fragments, which cannot be synthesized into complete elves
7. The spirits of different evolution series have different Z awakening fragments
8. Z Awakening Fragments can be used for Z Awakening training of elves, extreme attribute training, and super-evolutionary materials
9. Z Awakening Reset Instructions:

①Resetting will return 100% of the cultivation resources, and the Z awakening fragments exchanged in the returned resources will still be Z awakening fragments, and will not become elves or elf fragments
② Consumed spirits or spirit fragments will be converted and returned to Z awakening fragments
#C0xF76B45#[Basic Rules]
fmt_tw: #C0xF76B45#【基礎規則】
fmt_en: #C0xF76B45#[Basic Rules]

fmt: 1. The experience value of the power of awakening level comes from the Z awakening training of all elf series
2. Every time you activate a Z awakening training, you can get a certain experience value
3. When the experience value is satisfied, the level of awakening power will be automatically increased
4. If the Z awakening of the elf is reset, the awakening power will reduce the corresponding experience value
5. After the power of awakening loses the experience value, the level and the corresponding bonus effect will also be invalid
#C0xF76B45#[Basic Rules]

fmt: 5. After winning each battle, you can choose one of the three optional medals

fmt: 6. The medal plays a decisive role in the battle, so choose carefully

fmt: 7. Defeat the final BOSS to complete this round, and record the number of passes and rounds

fmt: #C0xF76B45#[Battle Rules]
fmt_tw: #C0xF76B45#【戰鬥規則】
fmt_en: #C0xF76B45#[Battle Rules]

fmt: 1. At the end of the battle, all the Pokémons' HP and the anger of starting line up Pokémons will be retained. Pokémons recruited in the middle will have a fixed anger each time they participate in the battle.
fmt_tw: 1.戰鬥結束會保留己方全部精靈血量和首發精靈的怒氣，中途招募的精靈每次參戰都為固定怒氣
fmt_en: 1. At the end of the battle, all the Pokémons' HP and the anger of starting line up Pokémons will be retained. Pokémons recruited in the middle will have a fixed anger each time they participate in the battle.

fmt: 2. If Pokémons are killed in battle, they cannot enter battle again
fmt_tw: 2.戰鬥過程中精靈陣亡，則不可再上陣
fmt_en: 2. If Pokémons are killed in battle, they cannot enter battle again

fmt: 3. Cleared stages cannot be repeated challenges
fmt_tw: 3.戰鬥勝利後的關卡不可重複挑戰
fmt_en: 3. Cleared stages cannot be repeated challenges

fmt: #C0xF76B45#[Reward Rules]
fmt_tw: #C0xF76B45#【獎勵規則】
fmt_en: #C0xF76B45#[Reward Rules]

fmt: 1. The #C0xF76B45# After event ends, all achievement rewards will not be reissued, please be sure to collect before the event ends#C0x5B545B#
fmt_tw: 1.#C0xF76B45#活動結束，所有成就獎勵不補發，請務必在活動結束前領取#C0x5B545B#
fmt_en: 1. The #C0xF76B45# After event ends, all achievement rewards will not be reissued, please be sure to collect before the event ends#C0x5B545B#

fmt: 2. You can get first clearance reward after stage first clearance. Repeat challenges can get challenge rewards after clearance
fmt_tw: 2.首次通關時，可獲得首次通關獎勵，通關後，重複挑戰可獲得挑戰獎勵
fmt_en: 2. You can get first clearance reward after stage first clearance. Repeat challenges can get challenge rewards after clearance

fmt: 3. During event, the limit of coins obtain by stage challenge is #Icommon/icon/icon_gold.png-56-56#8000000
fmt_tw: 3.活動持續期間，副本挑戰獲得的金幣上限為#Icommon/icon/icon_gold.png-56-56#8000000
fmt_en: 3. During event, the limit of coins obtain by stage challenge is #Icommon/icon/icon_gold.png-56-56#8000000

fmt: 1. The #C0xF76B45# After event ends, all achievement rewards will not be reissued, please be sure to collect before the event ends#C0x5B545B#
fmt_tw: 1.#C0xF76B45#活動結束，所有成就獎勵不補發，請務必在活動結束前領取#C0x5B545B#
fmt_en: 1. The #C0xF76B45# After event ends, all achievement rewards will not be reissued, please be sure to collect before the event ends#C0x5B545B#

fmt: 2. You can get first clearance reward after stage first clearance. Repeat challenges can get challenge rewards after clearance
fmt_tw: 2.首次通關時，可獲得首次通關獎勵，通關後，重複挑戰可獲得挑戰獎勵
fmt_en: 2. You can get first clearance reward after stage first clearance. Repeat challenges can get challenge rewards after clearance

fmt: 3. During event, the limit of coins obtain by stage challenge is #Icommon/icon/icon_gold.png-56-56#8000000
fmt_tw: 3.活動持續期間，副本挑戰獲得的金幣上限為#Icommon/icon/icon_gold.png-56-56#3000000
fmt_en: 3. During event, the limit of coins obtain by stage challenge is #Icommon/icon/icon_gold.png-56-56#8000000

fmt: 1. During the event, assign Pokémon to execute according to the commission, various rewards waiting for you!
fmt_tw: 1.活動期間，根據委託指派精靈執行，執行完成後可獲得豐富獎勵！
fmt_en: 1. During the event, assign Pokémon to execute according to the commission, various rewards waiting for you!

fmt: 2. To execute the commission, you need to dispatch Pokémons that meet the requirements of the commission, spend action points, and cost certain amount of time. If #C0xF76B45# meets the commission's extra requirements, you can get extra surprises!
fmt_tw: 2.執行委託需要派遣符合委託要求的精靈，扣除行動點，並耗費一定時長，若#C0xF76B45#滿足委託的加分要求，則可收穫額外驚喜！
fmt_en: 2. To execute the commission, you need to dispatch Pokémons that meet the requirements of the commission, spend action points, and cost certain amount of time. If #C0xF76B45# meets the commission's extra requirements, you can get extra surprises!

fmt: 3. Commissions are divided into main lines and branch lines, which are arranged orderly in map. You need to #C0xF76B45#complete the previous commission before proceeding to the next commission.
fmt_tw: 3.委託分為主線與支線，在地圖中有序排列，需要#C0xF76B45#先完成前置委託後，才可進行下一個委託
fmt_en: 3. Commissions are divided into main lines and branch lines, which are arranged orderly in map. You need to #C0xF76B45#complete the previous commission before proceeding to the next commission.

fmt: 4. There are #C0xF76B45# commissions on the branch line that can be carried out multiple times, #C0x5B545B# also has #C0xF76B45# treasure chest rewards, #C0x5B545B# the former one #C0xF76B45# can get various rewards, #C0x5B545B# the latter one #C0xF76B45# can get rewards right away, don't miss them!
fmt_tw: 4.支線上的委託有#C0xF76B45#可進行多次的，#C0x5B545B#也有#C0xF76B45#寶箱獎勵，#C0x5B545B#前者#C0xF76B45#可獲得不菲獎勵，#C0x5B545B#後者則#C0xF76B45#無需耗時即獲得獎勵，千萬不要錯過它們！
fmt_en: 4. There are #C0xF76B45# commissions on the branch line that can be carried out multiple times, #C0x5B545B# also has #C0xF76B45# treasure chest rewards, #C0x5B545B# the former one #C0xF76B45# can get various rewards, #C0x5B545B# the latter one #C0xF76B45# can get rewards right away, don't miss them!

fmt: 5. All commissions (including treasure chests) displayed on the map can be tap to view details whether completed
fmt_tw: 5.地圖上展示的所有委託（包括寶箱），在沒有完成的狀態下，均可以點擊進行查看
fmt_en: 5. All commissions (including treasure chests) displayed on the map can be tap to view details whether completed

fmt: 4. Asignment needs to be done manually. After commission is completed, remember to #C0xF76B45# to collect reward. Only 3 #C0x5B545B# commissions can be executed #C0x5B545B#at the same time, #C0xF76B45# including the commissions that have been completed but have not received rewards, please arrange properly
fmt_tw: 4.委託需要手動委派精靈，委託完成後記得要#C0xF76B45#親自收取獎勵。#C0x5B545B#同時#C0xF76B45#可執行（包括已完成未領取獎勵的委託）3個#C0x5B545B#委託，請妥善安排
fmt_en: 4.  Asignment needs to be done manually. After commission is completed, remember to #C0xF76B45# to collect reward. Only 3 #C0x5B545B# commissions can be executed #C0x5B545B#at the same time,  #C0xF76B45# including the commissions that have been completed but have not received rewards, please arrange properly

fmt: 5. When the commission is in progress, it is able to abandon commission in the middle. After abandon commission, timer resets to zero, action points will be returned, and will not be able to get commission rewards.
fmt_tw: 5.在委託進行中時，支持中途放棄任務，放棄任務後，任務計時歸零，歸還行動點，且不獲得委託獎勵。
fmt_en: 5. When the commission is in progress, it is able to abandon commission in the middle. After abandon commission, timer resets to zero, action points will be returned, and will not be able to get commission rewards.

fmt: 1. Welcome to the safari zone, it is said that the best way to hunt is to become prey
fmt_tw: 1.歡迎來到狩獵地帶，據說狩獵最好的方式就是將自己成為獵物
fmt_en: 1. Welcome to the safari zone, it is said that the best way to hunt is to become prey

fmt: 2. In the safari zone, the buffs gained from the battle victory and selection of healing supplies are all helpful for clearing the level.
fmt_tw: 2.在狩獵地帶中，戰鬥勝利獲得的增益效果、適當選擇治療補給都有助於通關
fmt_en: 2. In the safari zone, the buffs gained from the battle victory and selection of healing supplies are all helpful for clearing the level.

fmt: 3. The safari zone is divided into two routes, normal and advanced. The content, progress, and gain effects of the two routes are independent of each other and do not affect each other
fmt_tw: 3.狩獵地帶分為普通和進階兩個線路等待探索，兩條路線的內容、進度、增益效果等互相獨立，互不影響
fmt_en: 3. The safari zone is divided into two routes, normal and advanced. The content, progress, and gain effects of the two routes are independent of each other and do not affect each other

fmt: 4 The normal route restores 1 challenge attempts each 48 hours, advanced route restores 1 challenge attempts each 96 hours. The restoration time is 5 am UTC+8, and the cumulative limit is 5 times
fmt_tw: 4普通路線每48小時恢復1次挑戰次數，進階路線每96小時恢復1次挑戰次數；次數恢復時間為淩晨5點，次數累計上限為5次
fmt_en: 4 The normal route restores 1 challenge attempts each 48 hours, advanced route restores 1 challenge attempts each 96 hours. The restoration time is 5 am UTC+8, and the cumulative limit is 5 times

fmt: 5. After each route is unlocked, able to save challenge status until corresponding route attempt recovery point, system will reset the content of the route at the corresponding attempt recovery point.
fmt_tw: 5.每條路線開啟後直到對應線路的次數恢復節點都可保存該線路的挑戰狀態，系統將在對應線路的次數恢復節點重置該路線內容
fmt_en: 5. After each route is unlocked, able to save challenge status until corresponding route attempt recovery point, system will reset the content of the route at the corresponding attempt recovery point.

fmt: 6. During the challenge or after clearance, you can choose to end the challenge manually or wait for the system to automatically reset the route content
fmt_tw: 6.挑戰過程中或通關後，可選擇手動結束挑戰或等待系統自動重置路線內容
fmt_en: 6. During the challenge or after clearance, you can choose to end the challenge manually or wait for the system to automatically reset the route content

fmt: 7. When player reached certain Level to unlock Grind. According to highest history score and last time highest score, to grind over battle of certain stages, after grind over are able to claim all rewards and takes zero damage
fmt_tw: 7.當玩家達到一定等級後開啓碾壓，根據曆史最高戰績和上次最高表現，可以碾壓一定層數以下的戰鬥，碾壓後可以無傷過關並獲得全部獎勵
fmt_en: 7. When player reached certain Level to unlock Grind. According to highest history score and last time highest score, to grind over battle of certain stages, after grind over are able to claim all rewards and takes zero damage

fmt: #F40##L10# Refining instructions:
fmt_tw: #F40##L10#洗練說明：
fmt_en: #F40##L10# Refining instructions:

fmt: #F36#1. Each chip can only select at most 2 attributes for refining
fmt_tw: #F36#1.每個芯片最多只能選擇2條屬性進行洗練
fmt_en: #F36#1. Each chip can only select at most 2 attributes for refining

fmt: #F36#2. After selected refining attribute type and refining, the selected refining type will be locked, will be unable to cancel or change the refining target. This operation is irreversible, please select the refining type carefully before refining
fmt_tw: #F36#2.選定洗練的屬性條目洗練後，選定的洗練條目將被鎖定，將無法再取消或者更換洗練目標，此操作不可逆，請謹慎選擇洗練條目後再洗練
fmt_en: #F36#2. After selected refining attribute type and refining, the selected refining type will be locked, will be unable to cancel or change the refining target. This operation is irreversible, please select the refining type carefully before refining

fmt: #F36#3. During the refining, randomly selected refining attribute type and the enhance attempts of random attributes will be reset
fmt_tw: #F36#3.洗練時，會同時重置隨機所選擇洗練的屬性類型以及所有隨機屬性的強化次數
fmt_en: #F36#3. During the refining, randomly selected refining attribute type and the enhance attempts of random attributes will be reset

fmt: #F36#4. After resetting the refinement, you can re-select the attribute type for refinement
fmt_tw: #F36#4.重置洗練後可以重新選擇屬性條目進行洗練
fmt_en: #F36#4. After resetting the refinement, you can re-select the attribute type for refinement

fmt: #F36#3. Resetting the refinement can restore the refined attribute type to the original attribute type
fmt_tw: #F36#3.重置洗練可以將已洗練的屬性條目還原至初始的屬性類型
fmt_en: #F36#3. Resetting the refinement can restore the refined attribute type to the original attribute type

fmt: #F36#4. After resetting the refinement, you can re-select the attribute type for refinement
fmt_tw: #F36#4.重置洗練後可以重新選擇屬性條目進行洗練
fmt_en: #F36#4. After resetting the refinement, you can re-select the attribute type for refinement

fmt: 1. In the learning chip rebirth, you can reset the learning chip you have trained to the default Lv.1 state
fmt_tw: 1.在學習芯片重生內，可將自己培養過的學習芯片重置至初始1級狀態
fmt_en: 1. In the learning chip rebirth, you can reset the learning chip you have trained to the default Lv.1 state

fmt: 2. After the learning chip is reborn, 100% of the level development resources will be returned, and these resources can be used to re-train other learning chips
fmt_tw: 2.學習芯片重生後，返還100%的等級養成資源，可以利用這些資源重新培養其他學習芯片
fmt_en: 2. After the learning chip is reborn, 100% of the level development resources will be returned, and these resources can be used to re-train other learning chips

fmt: 3. After learning chip rebirth,and enhance to the original level, its attribute type and enhance attempts will not change, the rebirth can only return resources, not randomizing attributes.
fmt_tw: 3.學習芯片重生後，再強化到原始等級時，其屬性條目和強化次數不會變化，即重生只能返還資源，不會重新隨機屬性
fmt_en: 3. After learning chip rebirth,and enhance to the original level, its attribute type and enhance attempts will not change, the rebirth can only return resources, not randomizing attributes.

fmt: 4. The rebirth of learning chip requires diamonds. The higher the training level of the rebirth learning chip, the more diamonds will be needed. The limit of the consumption of a single learning chip is 100#Icommon/icon/icon_diamond.png-56-56#
fmt_tw: 4.學習芯片重生需要消耗鑽石，重生的學習芯片培養程度越高需要的鑽石會更多；單個學習芯片重生鑽石消耗上限爲100#Icommon/icon/icon_diamond.png-56-56#
fmt_en: 4. The rebirth of learning chip requires diamonds. The higher the training level of the rebirth learning chip, the more diamonds will be needed. The limit of the consumption of a single learning chip is 100#Icommon/icon/icon_diamond.png-56-56#

fmt: 5. The untrained learning chip cannot be rebirth, nor will it appear in the interface of the optional learning chip rebirth
fmt_tw: 5.未培養過的學習芯片無法進行重生，也不會出現在重生可選學習芯片的界面內
fmt_en: 5. The untrained learning chip cannot be rebirth, nor will it appear in the interface of the optional learning chip  rebirth

fmt: 1. Wearing chips can increase CP of Pokémon
fmt_tw: 1.穿著芯片可以增加精靈的戰鬥能力
fmt_en: 1. Wearing chips can increase CP of Pokémon

fmt: 2. Each chip has 1 to 2 fixed attributes and several random attributes
fmt_tw: 2.每個芯片擁有1~2條固定屬性和若幹條隨機屬性
fmt_en: 2. Each chip has 1 to 2 fixed attributes and several random attributes

fmt: 3. Chips have corresponding set attributes. Wearing 2/4 chips of same set attributes can activate their corresponding set attributes. The higher the chip quality, the better the set attributes.
fmt_tw: 3.芯片有對應的套裝屬性，穿2/4件同一套裝屬性的芯片能夠激活其對應的套裝屬性，芯片品質越高，套裝屬性越好
fmt_en: 3. Chips have corresponding set attributes. Wearing 2/4 chips of same set attributes can activate their corresponding set attributes. The higher the chip quality, the better the set attributes.

fmt: 4. Each chip can only be assembled in its designated position
fmt_tw: 4.每個芯片只能裝配到其指定的位置中
fmt_en: 4. Each chip can only be assembled in its designated position

fmt: 5. Chip slot description:
fmt_tw: 5.芯片位置說明:

fmt: 1. Enhancement can improve chip level, the higher the level, the higher the main attribute
fmt_tw: 1.強化可以提升芯片等級，等級越高主屬性越高
fmt_en: 1. Enhancement can improve chip level, the higher the level, the higher the main attribute

fmt: 2. Enhancement needs to consume coins, other chips or exclusive enhancement materials
fmt_tw: 2.強化需要消耗金幣，其他的芯片或者專屬強化材料
fmt_en: 2. Enhancement needs to consume coins, other chips or exclusive enhancement materials

fmt: 3. When using chips above Lv.1 as a enhance material, after the enhancement succeed, coins used for enhancement of the chip as the material will be returned
fmt_tw: 3. 使用超過1級的芯片作爲強化材料時，強化成功後，作爲材料的芯片強化所消耗的金幣會返還
fmt_en: 3. When using chips above Lv.1 as a enhance material, after the enhancement succeed,  coins used for enhancement of the chip as the material will be returned

fmt: 4. Upgrading level can also unlock new random attributes and enhance random attributes that have been obtained. Random attribute enhancement attempts is limited.
fmt_tw: 4.提升等級還可以解鎖新的隨機屬性和隨機強化已經獲得的隨機屬性，單條隨機屬性的強化次數有上限
fmt_en: 4. Upgrading level can also unlock new random attributes and enhance random attributes that have been obtained. Random attribute enhancement attempts is limited.

fmt: #L10##C0xF76B45# "In the hot summer, use a cool water-ice to smooth your soul"
fmt_tw: #L10##C0xF76B45#"炎炎夏日，用一份清涼的刨冰消除內心的聒噪"
fmt_en: #L10##C0xF76B45# "In the hot summer, use a cool water-ice to smooth your soul"
fmt_kr: #L10##C0xF76B45#"무더운 여름엔 시원한 빙수로 지친 마음을 달래주자"

fmt: #L10##C0xF76B45#[Activity Rules]:
fmt_en: #L10##C0xF76B45#[Activity Rules]:
fmt_kr: #L10##C0xF76B45#[이벤트 규칙]:

fmt: 1. After the event starts, Trainers will make water-ice for Pokémon to eliminate the heat
fmt_tw: 1.活動開啓後，訓練家們會爲寶可夢們制作刨冰，消除炎熱
fmt_en: 1. After the event starts, Trainers will make water-ice for Pokémon to eliminate the heat
fmt_kr: 1. 이벤트가 오픈 후 트레이너들이 포켓몬들을 위해 빙수를 만들어 더위를 식힙니다.

fmt: 2. Pokémon will propose their favorite flavors of water-ice after playing, and trainers need to remember their needs before the progress bar ends.
fmt_tw: 2.寶可夢們在上場後會提出自己喜歡的刨冰口味，訓練家們需要在進度條結束前記憶需求
fmt_en: 2. Pokémon will propose their favorite flavors of water-ice after playing, and trainers need to remember their needs before the progress bar ends.
fmt_kr: 2. 포켓몬들은 찾아오면 자신이 좋아하는 빙수 맛을 주문하고 트레이너들은 진도표가 끝나기 전에 주문 메뉴를 기억해야 합니다.

fmt: 3. After the progress bar is over, Pokémon will hide their own needs, and trainers needs to select the needs of Pokémons by memorize it
fmt_tw: 3.進度條結束後，精靈會隱藏起自己提出的需求，需要玩家憑記憶選出精靈提出的需求
fmt_en: 3. After the progress bar is over, Pokémon will hide their own needs, and trainers needs to select the needs of Pokémons by memorize it
fmt_kr: 3. 진도표가 끝난 후 포켓몬은 자신이 원하는 것을 숨기고 트레이너는 기억으로 주문 내용을 선택해야 합니다.

fmt: 4. After the first Pokémon makes a request, you need to tap [Start Making] to open refrigerator and make water-ice for Pokémon
fmt_tw: 4.第一只精靈提出需求後，需要點擊【開始制作】來開啓冰箱，爲精靈制作刨冰
fmt_en: 4. After the first Pokémon makes a request, you need to tap [Start Making] to open refrigerator and make water-ice for Pokémon
fmt_kr: 4. 첫 번째 포켓몬이 주문 후 [만들기 시작]을 클릭하여 냉장고를 열고 빙수를 만듭니다.

fmt: 5. After the selection is completed, Pokémon will make a service evaluation for the trainer's choice, and the judgment is divided into three levels
fmt_tw: 5.選擇完畢後，精靈會對訓練家的選擇做出服務評價，判定分三個等級
fmt_en: 5. After the selection is completed, Pokémon will make a service evaluation for the trainer's choice, and the judgment is divided into three levels
fmt_kr: 5. 선택 완료 후 포켓몬은 트레이너의 선택에 대한 서비스 평가를 통해 3등급 판정을 진행합니다.

fmt: #C0xF76B45#Perfect served: #C0x5B545B# There is no error and the order is correct
fmt_tw: #C0xF76B45#完美服務：#C0x5B545B#沒有錯誤且順序無誤
fmt_en: #C0xF76B45#Perfect served: #C0x5B545B# There is no error and the order is correct

fmt: #C0xF76B45#Good served: #C0x5B545B# There is no error but the order is wrong

fmt_en: #C0xF76B45#Good served: #C0x5B545B# There is no error but the order is wrong
fmt_kr: #C0xF76B45#보통 서비스: #C0x5B545B#착오가 없지먼 순서가 틀렸다.

fmt: #C0xF76B45# Badly served: #C0x5B545B# There is a wrong choice

fmt_en: #C0xF76B45# Badly served: #C0x5B545B# There is a wrong choice
fmt_kr: #C0xF76B45#불량 서비스: #C0x5B545B#잘못 선택한 수요가 있다.

fmt: 6. After served, there will be a service evaluation display, #C0xF76B45# but the next customer will soon come up to make request, don’t miss the memory time #C0x5B545B#
fmt_tw: 6.服務後會有服務評價展示，#C0xF76B45#但注意下一位顧客很快會上場提需求，不要錯過記憶時間哦#C0x5B545B#
fmt_en: 6. After served, there will be a service evaluation display, #C0xF76B45# but the next customer will soon come up to make request, don’t miss the memory time #C0x5B545B#
fmt_kr: 6. 서비스 후 서비스 리뷰가 나오지만 #C0xF76B45#다음 고객은 바로 찾아와 주문할테니 기억 시간을 놓치지 않도록 주의하세요.#C0x5B545B#

fmt: 7. As the number of service rounds increases, the demands made by Pokémon may also increase
fmt_tw: 7.隨著服務輪數的提高，精靈提出的需求可能也會變多

fmt: 8. After the total countdown is over, business will be closed, and the final reward items will be settled according to the trainer’s service result
fmt_tw: 8.總倒計時結束後停止營業，會根據訓練家的服務狀態結算最後的獎勵物品

fmt: 1. After the event is opened, trainers can play volleyball on the beach without attempt limit each day
fmt_tw: 1.活動開啓後，玩家可以在沙灘上暢玩排球，每日沒有次數限制
fmt_en: 1. After the event is opened, trainers can play volleyball on the beach without attempt limit each day
fmt_kr: 1. 이벤트가 시작된 후, 매일 횟수 제한 없이 모래사장에서 배구를 즐길 수 있습니다.

fmt: 2. After entering the game, the player needs to choose one of the three attributes as the advantage attribute for Pokémon you use
fmt_tw: 2.進入遊戲後，玩家需要選擇三種屬性的其中一種作爲使用精靈的優勢屬性
fmt_en: 2. After entering the game, the player needs to choose one of the three attributes as the advantage attribute for Pokémon you use
fmt_kr: 2. 게임에 들어간 후 포켓몬의 장점 속성으로 3가지 속성 중 하나를 선택해야 합니다.

fmt: 3. After selection, the corresponding Pokémon will be sent to the battle!
fmt_tw: 3.選擇後會爲您派遣對應的精靈出戰！
fmt_en: 3. After selection, the corresponding Pokémon will be sent to the battle!
fmt_kr: 3. 선택 후 해당 포켓몬을 보내 출전합니다!

fmt: 4. By default, the left side of the field is your own field, and the right side is the opponent field.
fmt_tw: 4.場地默認左邊是己方場地，右邊是對手場地
fmt_en: 4. By default, the left side of the field is your own field, and the right side is the opponent field.
fmt_kr: 4. 장소 왼쪽이 자기편 코트이며, 오른쪽은 상대 코트입니다.

fmt: 5. The player can move the Pokémon left and right, Pokémon will hit back the ball from the opponent by their heads, and the player can also use the following three ways to fight back your opponent\n
fmt_tw: 5.玩家可以左右移動精靈，精靈們會用頭回擊對方打來的球，玩家還可以用下面三種方式秀操作\n
fmt_en: 5. The player can move the Pokémon left and right, Pokémon will hit back the ball from the opponent by their heads, and the player can also use the following three ways to fight back your opponent\n
fmt_kr: 5. 포켓몬을 좌우로 움직일 수 있고 상대방이 쳐온 공을 헤딩으로 받아치며, 다음 3가지 방법으로 조작을 할 수 있습니다.\n

fmt: 6. When the ball returns to the opponent's bounds, but the opponent does not catch it, you will get 1 point
fmt_tw: 6.球打回到對方界內，但對方沒接到時，就可以獲得1分
fmt_en: 6. When the ball returns to the opponent's bounds, but the opponent does not catch it, you will get 1 point
fmt_kr: 6.공은 상대 경계선 안으로 돌아가 상대가 받지 못하면 자기 편 1점을 획득합니다.

fmt: 7. If you hit out of bounds, your opponent will get 1 point.
fmt_tw: 7.如果打到對方界外，或者因爲失誤自己打出界外，會讓對手獲得1分
fmt_en: 7. If you hit out of bounds, your opponent will get 1 point.
fmt_kr: 7.상대 경계선 밖으로 치거나 자기 실수로 아웃되면 상대가 1점을 획득합니다.

fmt: 8. Player that gets 3 points first wins
fmt_tw: 8.優先獲得3分的一方爲勝利方
fmt_en: 8. Player that gets 3 points first wins
fmt_kr: 8. 3점을 먼저 획득한 쪽이 승리합니다.

fmt: 9. Completing the corresponding tasks can get rich rewards
fmt_tw: 9.完成對應任務可以獲得豐厚的獎勵

fmt_kr: 9. 해당 퀘스트를 완료하면 푸짐한 보상을 획득할 수 있습니다.
