fmt: 1. During the event, complete the task to pray on the event interface
fmt_tw: 1.活動期間，完成任務即可在活動介面上進行祈福
fmt_kr: 1. 이벤트 기간 동안 퀘스트를 완료하면 이벤트 페이지에서 복을 빌 수 있습니다.

fmt: 2. When praying, you can get random ordinary blessings, and you can also get lucky blessings
fmt_tw: 2.祈福時可以獲得隨機普通祝福，也可以獲得幸運祝福
fmt_kr: 2. 복을 빌때 무작위 일반 보상을 획득할 수 있으며, 베스트 보상도 획득 가능합니다.

fmt: 3. Every time you pray, if you do not get lucky blessings, you will be able to light up a lucky lottery. The more lucky signs you light up, the greater the probability of getting lucky blessings. When you light up all the lucky signs in the interface , you will definitely get lucky blessings next time
fmt_tw: 3.每次祈福，若沒有獲得幸運祝福，將可點亮一張幸運簽，幸運簽點亮個數越多的，獲得幸運祝福的概率就越大，當點亮界面中所有的幸運簽後，下一次必定可獲得幸運祝福
fmt_kr: 3. 복을 빌 때마다 베스트 보상을 획득하지 못 한다면 축복판 하나를 밝힐 수 있으며, 축복판을 밝힌 개수가 많을수록 베스트 보상을 획득할 확률도 높아집니다. 모든 축복판을 밝힌 후 다음 번 복을 빌 때 반드시 베스트 보상을 획득할 수 있습니다.

fmt: 4. The task is reset regularly every day. Please pay attention to completing and receiving it in time. The number of blessings you have obtained will not be reset and will be kept until the end of the event
fmt_tw: 4.任務每日定時重置，請注意及時完成以及領取，已獲得的祈福次數不重置，將一直保留至活動結束
fmt_kr: 4. 축복 퀘스트는 매일 정해진 시간에 리셋되니 제때에 완료 및 수령을 주의해주세요. 이미 얻은 축복 횟수는 리셋하지 않고 이벤트 종료 때까지 유지됩니다.

fmt: 5. In the blessing record in the blessing task interface, you can view the rewards obtained in this event
fmt_tw: 5.祈福任務界面中的祈福記錄內，可以查看本次活動獲得的獎勵內容
fmt_kr: 5. 축복 임무 페이지의 축복 기록, 이번 이벤트에서 획득한 보상 내용을 확인할 수 있습니다.

fmt: 1. The upper limit of emails is #C0xF76B45#60#C0x5B545B#
2. When the upper limit of emails is exceeded, some old emails will be lost, please deal with them in time
#L10##C0xF76B45#Strong ones, welcome to the house battle
#L10##C0xF76B45#【Selection Rules】
1. The house project needs to select a total of #C0xF76B45#16#C0x5B545B# strong guilds to compete in multiple servers

2. The project will be selected based on the accumulated points of the three-week guild battle (you can check it in the big battle interface of the house), and the guilds ranked first and second in #C0xF76B45# and #C0x5B545B# will be selected directly

3. If there is no guild with the required number of projects in the matching cross-server group, it will be selected from the 3rd to 5th guild battle points ranking in the same cross-server group (the guild with a higher total combat power will be selected first) )

4. After the three-week guild battle is over, the guild and the participating members in the guild will be locked. Members who subsequently join the selected guild cannot participate in the current room battle
#L10##C0xF76B45#【Basic rules】
1. House Wars takes #C0xF76B45# four weeks #C0x5B545B# as a season, after collecting three weeks of guild battle points ranking information, the fourth week will start

2. The house battle is divided into two stages: the preliminary round and the final round. The preliminary round is the #C0xF76B45# Friday #C0x5B545B# of the opening week, and the final is the #C0xF76B45# Sunday #C0x5B545B# of the opening week

3. For the selected guild, the system will automatically register for the guild members. Members in the guild need to choose their own engineering team and corresponding lineup at #C0xF76B45#9:00~20:50#C0x5B545B#
4. For players who have not selected a battlefield 10 minutes before the game, the system will randomly assign battlefields and select elves with higher combat power to form formations
5. Official start time: #C0xF76B45#21:00#C0x5B545B#
#L10##C0xF76B45#【Preliminary round rules】

1. Preliminary stage: The selected 16 guilds will be divided into four bidding groups according to their combat power rankings. Members of the guilds need to sign up for the engineering groups they want to participate in within the specified time
2. There are three engineering groups
6-person construction team: two teams can be dispatched, each with 6 elves
4-person survey team: three teams can be dispatched, each with 4 elves
1-person design team: three teams can be dispatched, each with 3 elves

Participating players can only choose one of the arenas to participate in the battle. After the registration project time is over, the engineering group and the battle elves will be locked. They cannot be modified after the battle starts.
3. In the battle, after the first team is knocked down, the second team can continue to fight in the next round
4. The form of the game is a melee mode, and you will be matched with players who are not from the guild first (when the remaining players are all players from the guild, the battle ends)
5. The victorious player can continue to the next round of battle and continue to fight against other non-guild opponents

6. Players who have no elves to participate in the battle will be temporarily eliminated. If the guild of the eliminated player successfully advances to the final, they will advance together; if the guild of the eliminated player fails to advance, they will miss the championship competition
6. Retain HP and Rage after each battle
7. There is a points mechanism in the house battle, and different engineering teams will get different points for victory and failure
6-person construction team: #C0xF76B45#9#C0x5B545B# points for victory, #C0xF76B45#3#C0x5B545B# points for failure
4-person survey team: #C0xF76B45#8#C0x5B545B# points for victory, #C0xF76B45#2#C0x5B545B# points for failure
1-person design team: #C0xF76B45#10#C0x5B545B# points for victory, #C0xF76B45#4#C0x5B545B# points for failure
8. After the battle, extra points will be awarded according to the number of surviving players in the guild
9. Whether the guild advances is determined by the accumulated points of the guild members in different engineering groups on that day
10. The two sides will fight for a maximum of 10 rounds. If there is no winner at the end of the time, the side with a higher percentage of remaining blood volume will win
11. After the preliminary competition, the four battle groups will select their first team to participate in the final, and the remaining guilds will be eliminated
#L10##C0xF76B45# [Final Rules]
1. According to the results of the preliminary competition, select four strong guilds to enter the final championship competition
2. The final competition system is unified with the preliminary competition
3. Finally, the final ranking will be made according to the points mechanism of the preliminary round, and the 1st to 4th places will be determined
4. The champion guild will receive the supreme honor visible to every guild in the cross-server group
#L10##C0xF76B45#【Spirit Ability Change】
1. During the entire room battle, in each round of the battle, all elves that enter the battle team for the first time can get certain attack, defense, speed and other attribute bonuses
2. As the battle continues, the attribute bonus will be attenuated, and the elves will become tired, and the combat ability will become weaker and weaker
3. Every time you participate in a battle, the attributes of the elves in the team, such as attack, defense, speed, and healing amount, will continue to decrease
#L10##C0xF76B45#【Guessing rules】
1. All players in the same cross-server group can participate in the quiz (including players participating in battles)
2. Preliminaries and finals can be guessed
In the preliminary stage, players can guess four times (one for each battle group), and the goal of guessing is to advance to the final guild
In the final stage, players can guess once, and the goal of the guess is the champion
3. Guessing requires consumption of guild coins, 500 guild coins are required for each quiz in the preliminary round, and 2000 guild coins are required for the final quiz
4. Players who participate in the quiz will be rewarded, and the rewards will be distributed by mail
#L10##C0xF76B45#【Reward Rules】
1. After the competition, all rewards will be sent by mail;
2. The house battle is a glory battle with the guild as the unit, and the guild ranking rewards are obtained by all participants of the guild
3. All guilds participating in the preliminary round and the final round will receive a reward
4. The guild that wins the championship of the final can be displayed with the highest honor in the cross-server group
5. Refer to the following rewards display for details on points ranking rewards
#L10##C0xF76B45# [preliminary and final quiz]
1. Players can make guesses on the day of the big battle
2. The quiz time is from 9:00 to 20:50 on Friday and Sunday
3. All players in the unified cross-server group can participate in the quiz
4. In the preliminary stage, you can guess a guild in each area, a total of four groups, and the goal of the guess is the first place in the group
5. In the final stage, you can choose one of the four guilds, and the goal of the quiz is the champion guild
6. Each quiz will consume a certain amount of guild coins
7. Players who guess successfully can get item rewards, and players who fail to guess will also get consolation prizes
8. If the player succeeds in all 5 guesses, he will receive additional rewards
